characters: BRING FORTH THE POTION AT ONCE
TITLE RISES IN GOTHIC, GOLD, IRON MAIDEN FONT
THE CEREMONY OF THE TWIN MOONS
COME-COME FOR YOU. LADY WARRIOR, I
BETWEEN BELLADONNA AND FABIOUS SINGING, AS THE
ARE ONE. I WILL COME. COME ON YOU
JULIE HISSES AND ATTACKS USING HIS FINGER NAILS AS CLAWS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SOMEWHERE... we see the racing footsteps of FOUR HORSES through the trees. The sound of a thunderous stampede. SOMEWHERE ELSE... A HOODED WITCH looks to the moons and spins around...

dialogues.speaker: HOODED WITCH
dialogues.text: The TIME IS NIGH! A COVEN OF HOODED WITCHES have formed a circle in the forest. A BEAUTIFUL MAIDEN is thrown on to a stone alter. She's terrified, her hands bound. THE WITCHES begin chanting as an EVIL LOOKING WARLOCK drops a LARGE CHALICE and enters the circle, wiping the remaining liquid from his mouth, smiling a toothy grin at the screaming maiden.

dialogues.speaker: WARLOCK
dialogues.text: It has been one hundred years since these two moons have aligned. Tonight under their glow I will fulfill the ANCIENT PROPHECY! And darkness shall return to the land as it did one thousand years ago. The Hooded Witches hiss with delight. The Warlock strokes the frightened maiden’s face.

dialogues.speaker: WARLOCK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Be not afraid, my dear. This is your destiny. You will bear my dark seed giving birth to a new age. An age of destruction. An age where. I rule the universe!!! THWIP! Out of no where, An arrow with a glowing tip finds its mark through the center of his open mouth... With a surprised look on his face, the Warlock drops dead. The WITCHES turn as a BAND OF GOLDEN KNIGHTS emerge from the forest and climb from their horses. Their ARCHERS taking aim on the HOODED HAGS. The WITCHES scream but it’s too late... arrows quickly cutting each down in unison. The Maiden can barely believe her eyes as all her captors suddenly lie died.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 2.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: THE HEAD KNIGHT steps forward, taking off his helmet.

dialogues.speaker: HEAD KNIGHT
dialogues.text: At ease maiden. You are safe. He looks up to the two moons now moving away from each other. The eclipse over.

dialogues.speaker: HEAD KNIGHT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: The world is safe.

dialogues.speaker: SECOND KNIGHT
dialogues.text: Let us pray that a hundred years from now, when these moons cross again. There is a hero as brave as you to keep the world from tumbling into darkness.

dialogues.speaker: MAIDEN
dialogues.text: God pray... The Maiden clutches the Knight and looks to the heavens. FADE TO BLACK. MAIDEN (0.S.) (CONT’D) (whispers) +-.A hero as brave. TITLE CARD: PRETTY MUCH ALMOST A HUNDRED YEARS LATER...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A doughy face is red with strain. His veins bulging. His eyes shut tight... Pull out to reveal -- PRINCE THADEOUS (30) is taking a huge rip from a-hookah being held up by THREE ELVES.

dialogues.speaker: ELF
dialogues.text: You must remain calm My Lord. This will help your nerves. Find your warrior’s heart inside you!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Gods be DAMNED! He exhales and coughs like a mad man. THADEOUS (CONT’D) I’m ready for anything now! The elves all laugh and high five the Prince.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 3.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Prince Thadeous? COURTNEY, a man who serves as the Prince’s trusty minstrel, peeks his head through the tent. COURTNEY (CONT’D) Sir, Mr. Tumblebottom is waiting for the duel.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: ..+.The Duel?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thadeous pokes his head out of his blue tent. Standing across the field in front of a red tent is the elf, JONATHAN TUMBLEBOTTOM. Next to him, BIG BEATRICE and a clan of little elves. Thadeous whispers to Courtney...

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Shit. Can’t do it. I’m too high. I can’t use a sword right now. I’m bound to hurt someone. Probably myself. Song, Courtney. Sing something to get me in the zone. Courtney strums his LYRE. Thadeous closes his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Prince Thadeous would win his love today. By smiting Tumblebottom badly in the face.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Enough. I hate that song.

dialogues.speaker: TUMBLEBOTTOM
dialogues.text: Come out from your hiding Prince Thadeous. You've had enough time to prepare. Face your destiny. Prepare to bleed by thy blade. Thadeous composes himself and steps out of the tent. The stoned elves and Courtney stand behind him. The elves just keep giggling. Blood shot eyes, ripped up.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Beatrice, look at him. He’s an elf and an asshole. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 4.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Is this really what you want? His love and sexuality rather than mine? Must we commit murder to decide your fate? Beatrice shrugs. Tumblebottom smiles.

dialogues.speaker: TUMBLEBOTTOM
dialogues.text: She loves you not, Prince Thadeous. Only upon your victory will she be yours. Thadeous “air measures” Tumblebottom’s height. He puts it around waist height and then pretends to get an air blow job from his measurement. Tumblebottom takes insult and puts his hand on his sword. TUMBLEBOTTOM (CONT’D) How dare you!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: How dare YOU, Sir! Thadeous grabs his own sword.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: So we both have our hands on our swords now. There’s no turning back once these blades are drawn. They begin to circle each other.

dialogues.speaker: TUMBLEBOTTOM
dialogues.text: I hope you enjoy bleeding.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I hope you enjoy bleeding as well. Because that is getting ready to happen to you! If the sword fight happens. Thadeous grips his sword and then...

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Fuck this! I am a powerful and beautiful prince! MINSTREL COURTNEY! Fight him and prove your commitment to this kingdom. COURTNEY, Thadeous’ loyal and little minstrel, shifts nervously as all eyes turn to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 5.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Your highness, I’m not trained in these ways-

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Yes, Your Highness. Courtney puts down his LYRE and then steps into the duel, posing no threat. Tumblebottom looks a little intimidated himself. He turns to his right hand man, LORI.

dialogues.speaker: TUMBLEBOTTOM
dialogues.text: Lori. You. Go fight this freak instead of me.

dialogues.speaker: LORI
dialogues.text: But Sir.

dialogues.speaker: TUMBLEBOTTOM
dialogues.text: You are my slave. Do it. Thadeous leans into Courtney’s ear, sizing up Lori.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: You can take him. You must. The reputation of my manhood is depending on you. Is The Beatrice looking at me? BIG BEATRICE is eating a TURKEY LEG and pays no attention.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: I don’t believe so, no.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Harlot. Go on then, murder him.

dialogues.speaker: TUMBLEBOTTOM
dialogues.text: To the death! Courtney steps forward as does Lori.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: I’ve never done this before so-

dialogues.speaker: LORI
dialogues.text: This should be easy then. Lori socks Courtney in the face, grabs him and spins him around. Throws him to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 6.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Gives him an Atomic Elbow and knocks the wind out of him. Courtney scrambles to escape, but is clearly getting his ass kicked for his kingdom. He gets in a few good hits and the wrestling match ensues. Thadeous gets excited about the fight, an enthusiastic spectator rooting for Courtney. Tumblebottom digs it too, pumping his fist for Lori. Tumblebottom steps back, lights a joint, takes a drag and hands it to Thadeous who accepts this good hearted gesture. Beatrice snores. A ROYAL ADVISOR rides a horse up the hill. Out of breath, he formally calls to his Prince.

dialogues.speaker: ROYAL ADVISOR
dialogues.text: Prince Thadeous! Thadeous hides the joint and Courtney and Lori try to play it cool and pretend they have not been fighting. ROYAL ADVISOR (CONT’D) Prince Thadeous, behold! Your father, King Tallious has requested your presence at once. Your brother the great Prince Fabious is soon to return home from his quest. His travel is near to the kingdom grounds.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Ah, fuck me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beautiful CASTLE sits high above THE KINGDOM OF DUBRIS. A GROUP OF BAD ASS KNIGHTS in shining armor ride into the kingdom atop their THUNDERING STEEDS, their SERVANTS and MINSTRELS in tow kicking up dust clouds. INT. THE GREAT HALL — DAY 6 Thadeous stares at his father as he is reprimanded. Courtney stands behind him looking a little beat up. KING TALLIOUS is a kind, weathered king who sits on his THRONE. His ADVISORS stand about.

dialogues.speaker: CCONTTNIUED Y
dialogues.text: 6 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 7.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: Don’t you want to welcome Prince Fabious home?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Why must I greet my brother, and bow to him because of a silly quest? Whenever I do extraordinary things that deserve a nut sucking nobody puts out rose petals or turkey feathers for me to prance upon.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: Your brother went on a noble journey putting his life on the line to protect this kingdom.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: And I've been doing things that I do to be done as well!

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Courtney, tell him the admirable accomplishments of my day.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Umm... You took a bubble bath with what's her name... and ate toast... and had a cat nap and persuaded the kitchen mistress to give you a rectal wash with partridge tears- The King sniffs the air.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: You smell of wizard’s weed and bloodberry rum. What have I told you about-?!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: -I evacuated a band of heathens in the valley that were threatening our women and children by distributing mind altering substances. They were breathing on me and exuding a stench most foul!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 8.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: Why do I find that hard to believe? Suddenly, THE DOORS swing open, and in trots JULIE, another fey man minstrel with a scroll. A SILENT CROWD follows him in. Julie clears his throat. Thadeous rolls his eyes, takes one of THE OLD WISE ADVISOR’S GOBLETS and starts chugging.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Here ye, here ye! I have come to herald news, and might I add with blossoming personal joy... THE

dialogues.speaker: RETURN OF PRINCE FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Everyone in THE GREAT HALL applauds! A BAND plays. PRINCE FABIOUS, rides in on a LARGE WHITE STEED. Your classic hero, good looks, good hair, and charm out the ass. The Prince dismounts his horse and takes a bow. The CROWD goes nuts! Fabious WINKS, sending a row of SEXY GROUPIE MAIDENS fainting. Fabious ignores them all as he sees his brother and gets ecstatic.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Brother Thadeous!!! Oh how I’ve counted the days until we’d be reunited! I missed you so! Thadeous back pedals but Fabious is upon him instantly, kissing both his cheeks and hugging him aggressively.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Yes, all right, please stop that. Fabious smiles proudly, still holding Thad with one arm, unrelenting even as Thad tries to slide free.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Dear Brother, Dear Father...I return to the kingdom with only The Fates to thank. The menace that had been causing so much destruction in our kingdom proved to be a formidable opponent indeed.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: Whether you have slain the beast or not, my son, tis not important. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 9.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I just thank the Gods that you returned in one piece and-- From a large sack, Fabious pulls out THE SEVERED HEAD OF A CYCLOPS and holds it up for all to see.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Behold! The mighty Cyclops! The King and the rest of the hall gasp and burst into CHEERS. Blood drips from the disgusting head.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Look, it’s dripping all over the marble. That’s disgusting. The King pays no attention to Thadeous and embraces Fabious.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: Fabious you have made me the proudest a father could ever be, yet again! All the land owes you it’s gratitude and praise!

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Just my duty as a Prince to protect and defend this kingdom no matter how grave the danger. And I must confess there is still more good news to come. Father, Brother, Kingdom, I introduce you to my new love and bride to be, Belladonna. The Band kicks in again. Fabious opens the door to reveal: BELLADONNA standing between TWO KNIGHTS. Smoking hot. Goddamn. Her looks leave the King at a loss for words. Fabious skips to her. They embrace and tongue kiss madly. They compose themselves, and turn to the court. FABIOUS (CONT’D) Belladonna, this is my family!

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA
dialogues.text: Hi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A FEAST is served. The Royal Family sits at a table along with Boremont. Julie, Courtney and other SERVANTS hustle about as The BAND PLAYS. Fabious recounts his tale for all. Thadeous watches Belladonna who’s eating with her hands. (CONTTNUED )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 10.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: She’s also wearing a rather unfashionable elaborate dinner gown. Her hair is teased up in a strange style. She’s beautiful but there’s something that’s slightly off...a retard innocence.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: I laid in wait for hours, until I found my moment and sprung upon the creature. He fought hard but I fought harder. Laying him to waste with my blade. But I must not take credit for this victory alone. For I never would have found the Cyclops lair if it weren’t for the impeccable navigation skills of dear Simon. Everyone turns to his mechanical crow SIMON, as it flies through the room and lands on the back of a chair. CAWING as its beady robotic eyes light up.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Ew, not that disgusting fucker!

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: Thadeous, don’t talk with your mouth full. Thadeous chews his stew. Fabious continues...

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: It was then two days into our journey home, that the wind carried a most beautiful song from a high tower. And that’s where mine eyes found her. Belladonna nuzzles closer.

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA
dialogues.text: And mine his! I’d been held captive by the dark sorcerer Leezar in the Tower of Disorder since I was but a babe.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Leezar? Who is that?

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: An evil man, my brother.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: Evil indeed. A dark wizard who has attempted to take over these lands many times. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" — Draft 15th April 2009 ll.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: But his treachery has never been a match for this kingdom’s strength.

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA
dialogues.text: Nor for Fabious. I could barely believe my eyes when I saw him climbing the tower towards me. And before my evil captor was even aware, we had both slipped away. Belladonna holds up a fork.

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: My heart’s desire, what is this?

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: That’s a fork, my love. You use it for eating. Fabious demonstrates for her. She stares in wonder.

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA
dialogues.text: Abh.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Spending all of her life in captivity has left her unaware of a lot of our customs or...just things in general.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: So that would explain why she’s wearing that dress?

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA
dialogues.text: I’ve never been aloud to pick out my own clothes. This dress is the first. DO you like it? All eyes turn toward Thadeous.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Uh, it’s, well to be perfectly honest with you--

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: The dress is magnificent, Belladonna. I think no other woman has graced this hall with such beauty since my Queen was alive. Everyone bows their heads with respect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 12.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: If your mother were here today she would be very proud Fabious. Thadeous rolls his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Considering the many maidens I have bedded, I confess that I HAVE known delight, but until I found Belladonna, never a pleasure so gratifying as that of TRUE LOVE. The two collapse into a full on make out session. Julie, the minstrel, closes his eyes and strums his lyre. He scores their passion.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: THE GLORY OF ROMANCE! I will call upon my Criers to proclaim: Your wedding will be the greatest this kingdom.has ever seen! Here, here! All the COURT raises their GOBLETS. Thadeous stands.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Here, here, here, here! Attentions please! My turn, now. Shut up please. Courtney, if you would? Everyone keeps their goblets up. Courtney begins a rising tune on his lyre as Thadeous prepares himself.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I have a gift for the two lovers that I have orchestrated. Behold! MUSIC KICKS IN AS FIVE ASIAN ACROBATS come flipping into the room, followed by a man dressed up like a baby being chased by a man in a LION COSTUME. The lion picks up Belladonna and confuses her as he tries to dance with her. Thadeous steps out with a whip to dance and tame as the ringmaster of the performance. A random, yet somehow impressive spectacle. The Acrobats swarm the guest and paw at them like “Cirque Du Soleil” meets “Cats”. The big baby chases a frightened Belladonna around the stage.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: What is going on here?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 13.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Fabious thinks it’s funny and nods his head to the music. Thadeous starts cracking his whip and dancing harder. Some sort of Irish Slam Dancing with the Acrobats. The big baby-man picks up Belladonna and tries to carry her back to the table, but he trips and she lands on the table. It breaks and the feast goes crashing. Thadeous and the ACROBATS take a bow. The odd Vegas-like show is over, everyone is perplexed. Belladonna starts laughing hysterically with cake on her face. The King stand, furious:

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What was that?!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: (proud) Magical entertainments! They’re our dancing slaves. Even the big baby! I bought them for the kingdom. My gift to you all!!

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: Slaves? How and why did you pay for slaves? Fabious helps his fiance to her feet. Thadeous stews. KING TALLIOUS (CONT’D) Thadeous, how did you pay for this?! The King is getting angry. It becomes very awkward.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: If you must know, I DIDN'T pay for them. I TRADED some of our shittier villages to the South. King Tallious chokes on his WINE.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: You did what?!

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Thadeous is right, perhaps now isn’t the time to discuss--

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Oh shut up, Fabious! Always kissing father’s ass. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 14.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: No one cares what I do! I’m just as good a son and as you are and you know it!

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: You will not speak to your brother this way. Or treat our castle with vulgarities! Apologize. And apologize to Belladonna. She could have been killed!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Oh boring! I refuse.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I’m sorry for saying mean things and big-baby is sorry for making you fall upon the cake.

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA
dialogues.text: It’s all right Thadeous. All very amusing if you ask me.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: It’s all right, brother. It is good to be home. ‘

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Courtney gather my things, I am done eating dinner with these people! Thadeous dramatically gets up from the table.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: Thadeous! Come to me. Thadeous ambles over to his father. Tallious delivers an open handed SLAP that rings Thad’s bell.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You will respect me if not as your Father, then as your KING!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: That hurt, King!

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: T’was meant to.  "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 15.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The doors slam open, and Thadeous enters. He grabs a sword down from a wall of WEAPONS and torture devises. He holds. the sword out as if to stop an invisible foe. He begins FLAILING THE SWORD THROUGH THE AIR. He sucks at this. Eyes closed, swinging wildly with no control.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Take that, and shove it into your bruce and beans! I’1l show you. I am Thadeous, the greatest sword fighting man to ever live. You will be deceased! - Now do you respect me, father? He begins lunging the sword. Right then he hears:

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: You should swing with your hips brother, you get greater leverage. Here, let me show you... From behind Thadeous, Fabious appears. He stands behind him like one shows a woman how to golf.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hold your hands here and here, and swing from the hips like so... Fabious has his hands on his brother’s hips, and gently sways them as Thadeous quickly losses his mind.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: GET OFF OF ME! GODS! I know how to use a sword!

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Oh do you? Fabious grabs a sword and with a smile begins fencing with his brother. Taking it easy on him. Thadeous bites his lip and swings aggressively. With a few graceful slices through the air, Fabious shows who the athletic brother is. Thadeous stumbles backwards and almost gets his head sliced off by a tripped guillotine. FABIOUS (CONT’D) Oh dear! I’m dreadfully sorry Thadeous. Fabious helps him to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 16.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: You’re wrinkling my clothes! I can Manage on my own. Just then Simon flies into the room and perches on the window sill. Thadeous steams and points at Simon. THADEOUS (CONT’D) No way. Simon, get out of here. I don’t want him in here, Fabious!

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Simon, go back to my chambers. Simon flies away blinking. FABIOUS (CONT’D) Are you alright? You’re not cross with me are you, Thadeous?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Cross?! Why would I be cross? I mean besides the fact that everyone in the kingdom adores you and loathes me. You’re a perfect brother and a perfect prince and you'll be the perfect king one day. A fine King indeed... But what of me?

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: (with a chuckle) Well, Thadeous, First borns like me are Kings, second borns are... (hesitantly) Well, they can be what ever they chose to be.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: But I want to be KING! Fabious grabs Thadeous’ hand and holds it in the air.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: We can BOTH be King!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: NO! I want to be King by myself.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Sorry. Tradition runs deep. Speaking of which, there is one more thing I'd like to discuss... (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: CCONTTNUED \
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 17.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Would you do me the honor of being the Best Man at my wedding?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Best Man?

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Yes, brother. I could think of no one else I’d want by my side. Belladonna wishes it as well.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Of course she does. Does she even know what a wedding is?

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Truthfully, I had to explain it to her. But she’s all in now. She's had a tough life and I intend on changing that. So will you share in this most joyous day?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Sounds tedious and boring, but if I’m not mistaken it is a tradition that the Best Man is permitted to lay with the Bridesmaids... Plural. Perhaps I can move some things in my schedule around and make time for this chore. Fabious hugs his brother tight. THADEOUS (CONT’D) Here we go with the hugging again. I don’t understand how you can be so nice all of the time. You've just got back from a long quest. Don’t you ever get knackered or cranky for God’s sake? EXT. ROYAL COURTYARD/ FABIOUS’ WEDDING - DAY 9 Under a blizzard of flower pedals sprinkled from the castles highest spires the royal wedding of Fabious and Belladonna is set to go. INT. THADEOUS’ BEDCHAMBER - DAY 10 Thadeous is dressed elegantly. He sets his powdered wig and grooms himself in the mirror. Posturing. Satisfied. (CONTTNUED )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 10 11 12 “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 18.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Hello there, Best Man. With a wink, he departs... Ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thadeous walks down a hall with his chin held high. He passes a DRESSING ROOM where he hears laughter. SEVERAL KNIGHTS are getting dressed. One Knight, SIR BOREMONT, vents to them.

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: Best man? It’s an insult. How many quests have I been on with Fabious? Countless. And yet he chooses Thadeous. In all my life never have I seen such a sorry sack of shit.-Such a poor excuse for a prince. He’s nothing more than a self entitled rotten baby. The Knights laugh. Thadeous shifts from confidence to confusion. BOREMONT (CONT’D) I’m sure that dandy will fuck up somehow. Perhaps he’ll dress like a clown and give the entire kingdom a good giggle at his expense, like usual. Everyone laughs. Thadeous sadly takes his wig off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thadeous storms away from the castle. He huffs and puffs. He’s pissed. TWO BOYS run past play sword fighting.

dialogues.speaker: BOY 1
dialogues.text: I’m brave Prince Fabious!

dialogues.speaker: BOY 2
dialogues.text: No, I’m brave Prince Fabious! Thadeous snatches both wooden swords out of their hands and snaps them in two. (CONTTNUED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 12 13 14 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 19.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: That’s enough of that, you infants! He throws the swords on the ground and then begins crying. The boys just look at him weird. Thadeous becomes self conscious and runs away. Courtney chases after him.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Your Highness... What's wrong? Where are you going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fabious wanders the hall passing his formally dressed guests as he searches for his Best Man.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Thadeous?! Thadeous?! Where are you brother?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thadeous throws open the door of the little working class elves. Tumblebottom and his friends are working on some experiments in what looks to be a medieval drug lab.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Tumblebottom. I must inquire as to what we were smoking on the day of our deadly duel! Tumblebottom turns around with a brick of gorgeous ganja. He winks at the Prince who gives a proper courtsey. MOMENTS LATER... Thadeous and his new friends are hitting the wizard’s weed and complaining about life in general. Courtney behind him munching on some snacks. THADEOUS (CONT’D) Father throws this huge wedding for Fabious and what does he get me? Nothing. He can love him more but he should treat us as equals monetarily. He should buy me a magical steed or a Viking ship. Something. (CONTTNIUED )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 14 15 16 “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 20.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Shall we go join the wedding? I feel certain it is about to begin.

dialogues.speaker: TUMBLEBOTTOM
dialogues.text: It’s your brother’s wedding. You should be there.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: No. I have decided NOT to attend. I’1l remain hidden here with my new friends and let them worry about me. Thadeous takes a big hit. EXT. ROYAL COURTYARD/FABIOUS’ WEDDING - DAY 15 The royal party stands on a golden stage. King Tallious and Fabious confer as the ceremony waits.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: If Thadeous wishes to play forgetful on this his brother’s day of days, then wait we shall not!

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Very well, Father. I fear I can no longer bear not being married to this woman. Fabious scans the courtyard for Thadeous, disappointed. The King looks to Boremont, the Elite Knights, and Julie.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: Julie, you’re the best man.

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: (under his breath) Goddammit. Julie steps forward, proudly. Boremont bites his lip.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thadeous and the elves are playing a drinking game and cracking each other up. Shot after shot. They dance in merriment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 16 17 18 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 21.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: So... I don’t get it. What’s the difference between dwarves, elves, trolls, midgets and Leprechauns? The question is a buzzkill. Everyone stops and stares. at Thadeous like he crossed the line.

dialogues.speaker: TUMBLEBOTTOM
dialogues.text: By Gods are you an idiot? There no such thing as fucking Leprechauns! Everyone bursts into laughter. EXT. ROYAL COURTYARD/ FABIOUS’ WEDDING - DAY 17 The King stands before the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: As you all know, my eldest son, Prince Fabious, has had many quests, but none so adventurous as Marriage. Everyone gives a polite laugh. Julie claps. KING TALLIOUS (CONT’D) This is the proudest day in all my life, and I thank you all for joining with me. Everyone claps, and Julie steps on stage with a scroll.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: It has been my great fortune and utter privilege to have the honor of giving over my dedication and loyalty with utter conviction to the very dear Prince Fabious of Dubris. Fabious gives a smiling nod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TWO GUARDS stand at the fortified gate. A BLIND GYPSY approaches, pulling a WAGON with a large GOLDEN BOX. The guards step forward blocking his path.

dialogues.speaker: GUARD
dialogues.text: Aye, Stranger. Identify yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 18 19 “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 22.

dialogues.speaker: BLIND GYPSY
dialogues.text: I have come with a gift for the Prince.

dialogues.speaker: GUARD
dialogues.text: Which Prince?

dialogues.speaker: BLIND GYPSY
dialogues.text: The one that is getting married.

dialogues.speaker: GUARD
dialogues.text: What is the gift exactly?

dialogues.speaker: BLIND GYPSY
dialogues.text: It’s a surprise!

dialogues.speaker: GUARD
dialogues.text: A surprise?

dialogues.speaker: BLIND GYPSY
dialogues.text: Yes. It’s a secret.

dialogues.speaker: GUARD
dialogues.text: Come no further. We are under specific orders that only guests of the king are to enter the castle walls on this day.

dialogues.speaker: BLIND GYPSY
dialogues.text: I say, let me cross or lose your heads.

dialogues.speaker: GUARD
dialogues.text: Our heads? The gypsy steps back and with a wicked waving of his arms, a bolt of electricity shoots from his fingers and decapitates both guards. Their heads fall to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Belladonna walks down the aisle with her MAIDENS. She joins Fabious at the altar. He takes her hand.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: My darling...

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA
dialogues.text: My love... Belladonna then out of nowhere begins singing. She looks into Fabious’ eyes. He takes a deep breath and then goes for it and joins her in a duet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 19 20 21 “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 23.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: They sing a short verse of a cheesy love song in harmony. *Think Peter Cetera/Amy Grant 1987.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thadeous and Courtney are eating a feast with the elves. He is coming down off his drunken high. Thadeous stomps around their small cabin breaking things.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Ever since Mother died, I’ve gotten the short end up the royal shasta! Aye! My father refuses to see the good in me. Instead, he looks to Fabious: the laziest, drunkest, most disrepectful, arrogant, cockheadedest, prick ANY royal kingdom has EVER seen... I mean really, WHAT IN THE FUCK?! Thadeous collapses in devastated frustration. Tumblebottom consoles him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The song ends. The lovers look into each others eyes. Simon, the mechanical crow flies around the crowd. He CAWS and goes ape shit. Everyone turns. Up the aisle the Blind Gypsy pulls his wagon. THE GOLDEN BOX shimmering in the sunlight. The Gypsy has attracted the attention of all. The crowd falls quiet.

dialogues.speaker: BLIND GYPSY
dialogues.text: Greetings. I am looking for the great Prince Fabious and his beautiful bride to be. The crowd murmurs. The King looks to his son and shakes his head with an understanding smile.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: I’m sorry, old man, but now is not the time. Run along. We’re still in the midst of a ceremony. The Gypsy bows, embarrassed.

dialogues.speaker: BLIND GYPSY
dialogues.text: Oh my. A thousand pardons. It appears my timing is off... Or I am just in time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 21 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 24,

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: The King motions to his Knights.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: Help our guest with his wagon.

dialogues.speaker: BLIND GYPSY
dialogues.text: Oh, that won’t be necessary! In one swift motion, the figure rips off his cloak revealing his true identity. Decked out in a wizard robe, a skull cap, and wearing some serious Siegfried and Roy Man-Make-Up ‘tis...LEEZAR, the evil wizard. The crowd GASPS. Belladonna faints in Fabious’ arms.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: I’ve been expecting me!

dialogues.speaker: KNIGHTS TO ARMS
dialogues.text: THE ROYAL KNIGHTS unsheathe their swords and approach Leezar, who chuckles, twirling a SLEEK JEWELED STAFF.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: King Tallious, do you really think your pathetic band of worms can stop me? You should know better.

dialogues.speaker: MOPHINDUS
dialogues.text: Leezar spins his staff sending a BOLT at the approaching Knights. They all DROP THEIR SWORDS, and DOUBLE OVER in agonizing pain. The Royal Guard writhe on the ground, as Leezar saunters past them across the stage, caressing his staff.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: How dare you show your foul face here on the happiest day of my life!

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: How dare I? I only come to reclaim what is MINE. - Belladonna, get that sweet ass over here! Fabious steps in front of her, sword raised. (CONTTNUED )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 21 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 25.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Nothing here belongs to you, Leezar, except your stinking heart. And for disrupting my ceremony we will now stab that and watch it expire! The remaining Royal Knights unsheathe their swords and join the Prince. Leezar chuckles at the display. Leezar spins his staff sending a BLUE BALL OF ELECTRIC MAGIC right for The King. Fabious swings his blade, deflects the ball and sends it back at Leezar, who jumps as it explodes beneath him.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Well look at you.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: ENOUGH! Leave MY son and his bride alone and leave my Kingdom!

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Or what? Perhaps I’ll die at the blade of Prince Fabious?

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: You should be so lucky. Escape this life with your miserable soul!

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Ha! You feign honor, a disguised thief. You come into my lair, and you take what belongs to me? You steal from my home? You take MY

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: No one has love for you, Leezar. And when I end you here today, I’d wager not a single tear will be shed. By anyone!

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Perhaps... MOTHERS?! The GOLDEN BOX then opens and out crawls a RED ROBED WITCH, followed by another, and another, and another... (CONTTNUED )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 21 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 26.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: The crowd moves away as more ROBED WITCHES... The FOUR. MOTHERS OF LEEZAR emerge.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: We join our son in his decent into darkness and his rise to power! The WITCHES begin shooting BOLTS of ELECTRICITY at Fabious and the rest of the Knights, sending them flying into the air spinning. Fabious is knocked unconscious. The crowd goes nuts, screaming and running, total mayhem! In the midst of it all, LEEZAR SNATCHES BELLADONNA.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Here we are. Brought together in these chains of love. Belladonna lets out a scream. The witches shriek, as their magic sets the courtyard ablaze! Through the smoke-

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: Enough! Mothers and spawn of the dark realm! Leave MY Kingdom! The KING whips up a crossbow taken from a fallen guard. He lets an arrow fly... speeding right for LEEZAR when-- Leezar slams the ground with his staff sending out a SONIC BOOM! The speeding arrow explodes in the blast. The King is blown off the stage and carried off screaming by his secret service-like GUARDS. Leezar ROARS in pain, dropping Belladonna. Through his gut, we see the TIP OF A SWORD is sticking out. Behind him, with singed hair, is Fabious with his grip tight and pressing his sword right through Leezar. He withdraws his blade and steps back, grabbing Belladonna. Leezar looks down to the deep deadly wound...and then in mere seconds the wound closes up and heals itself. Fabious and Belladonna’s eyes go wide. Leezar looks up to them and giggles. ZAP--! Fabious is frozen in place from the powerful glow of Leezar’s staff. Belladonna screams in HORROR! LEEZAR BINDS HER with colorful energy coils. The coils bring her right to ground below him. He holds her by the hair, pulls the dagger from his back, and then licks his own blood from the blade. (CONTTNURD )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 21 22 23 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 27.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Farewell, Kingdom of Dubris. It , has been my PLEASURE! The ROBED WITCHES climb back into the golden box one by one, each disappearing inside. Leezar sticks his tongue in Belladonna’s ear and snaps his fingers. They disappear in a poof of smoke. The spell broken -- Fabious springs to life and dives after them into the box... WHAM! The magic doesn’t work for him. He smashes the box and lands on his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The castle stands still in the dark of night. From inside the walls the distinct MOANS of MAIDENS sobbing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thadeous enters the castle, bleary-eyed and buzzed. Instantly he sees that the vibe is not good. Injured people lay everywhere, the place is in ruins. SERVANTS tend to the King who’s bruised and battered.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: No one get up. I’m just going to my chambers. Very tired. Fabious sees his brother and runs to him.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Thank God, you are alive, brother! When you didn’t show up at the wedding I thought the worst. Have you heard?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Uh, you got married? Congrats. I was going to come but had some things pop up last minute.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Dear brother I bare horrible news. Leezar has taken my love. He has kidnapped Belladonna!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 23 “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 28.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Fabious wipes his tears. Simon sits in the window sill. He BLINKS and BEEPS sadly.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: Two of our guards were beheaded! And reports have it that you were seen playing grab ass in the Kwispy Swamps with derelict elves! All eyes are on Thadeous.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Uh...I don’t know who would have said that but their words are lies. Me and Courtney were, uh, we were, Courtney what were we doing? Courtney coughs. Julie appears in the doorway holding a scroll.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Here yee now! All greetings in time of tragedy, The Great White Wizard. GUARDS escort THE GREAT WHITE WIZARD.

dialogues.speaker: THE WHITE WIZARD
dialogues.text: The Wizard has cometh. What is it you seek from me?

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: We need your help. My bride-to-be was kidnapped by Leezar!

dialogues.speaker: THE GREAT WHITE WIZARD
dialogues.text: Ah, it is revenge you seek. Well be prepared. A wizard such as Leezar will not be undone with your blade no matter how well you wield it.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: This I know. I gutted him and he recovered as if it were nothing.

dialogues.speaker: THE GREAT WHITE WIZARD
dialogues.text: You’1l need a mystic blade to do this warlock in. A sword made of unicorn horn. The only material immune to this powers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 29.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Say where I can find such a sword and it shall be mine.

dialogues.speaker: THE GREAT WHITE WIZARD
dialogues.text: Eager, Fabious. The Blade of Unicorn is hidden in the depths of an Enchanted Cavern just beyond Muldiss Darton. You will face your darkest enemy and if you defeat it, the blade will be yours.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: I will journey at once!

dialogues.speaker: THE GREAT WHITE WIZARD
dialogues.text: Patience, Fabious. Let us fully understand the nature of the situation here. Allow me to think. The Wizard pulls out his LONG PIPE and packs the most AMAZING WIZARD GRASS Thadeous has ever seen.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Perhaps could I think as well? The White Wizard pays him no mind as he sits Indian Style in the middle of the hall. The White Wizard He licks his lips and inhales deeply and then exhales a huge smoke bubble. The whole court waits on his breath. They all look at him. Waiting...waiting...his eyes close. THADEOUS (CONT’D) Is he sleeping?

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: White Wizard? The White Wizard snaps awake.

dialogues.speaker: GREAT WHITE WIZARD
dialogues.text: Yes! Tis I, The Great White-! He looks around realizing where he is... GREAT WHITE WIZARD (CONT’D) -Of course. Now where were we...? © Ah yes. I’ve had a vision. The wizard takes a hit and exhales another smoke bubble.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 30.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: GREAT WHITE WIZARD (CONT’D) Prophecies foretell of a man impregnating a virgin woman under the eclipse of the two moons. The dark child she would bare would be a demon. A dragon. :

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: A what?

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Wait, Impregnate her?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: He wants to fuck her so he can make a dragon? Eww.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: This is horrible. Fabious’ whole body sinks. He leans against his father for support. Fabious can barely hold it together. Everyone seems to get it except Thadeous who continues on unknowingly.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: That is so disgusting. Imagine how gross that would look. Her. legs spread and a baby dragon all slime and blood covered with claws and wings and shit come squeezing out. Fabious can’t bear the thought of it. He pukes. Thadeous jumps out of the way.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: I can’t believe I let this happen.

dialogues.speaker: THE GREAT WHITE WIZARD
dialogues.text: Your bride is no good to him if she’s had intercourse previously.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: Ah, then Leezar’s plan is foiled! You have beded her, have you not?

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: (nervously) Well, uh... truth be told. I’ve been having concentration problems as of late. (MORE ) (CONTTNIED )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I think it’s the post-traumatic stress of the cyclops skirmish, and well... How exactly do you define intercourse? The crowd gasps.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I’m sorry. I have failed the Kingdom.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: Leezar must be stopped. The destruction he could induce with the aid of a beast as mighty and vicious as a dragon is unimaginable. When is this eclipse, White Wizard?

dialogues.speaker: THE GREAT WHITE WIZARD
dialogues.text: Not this Tuesday, but the next Tuesday. 31. 23 Fabious stands tall. We can see him gathering his courage and so can the crowd. He’s back in form.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Then we haven’t a moment to lose. I will lead a quest to rescue my love and with the mighty Unicorn Blade--

dialogues.speaker: THE GREAT WHITE WIZARD
dialogues.text: It’s actually Blade of The Unicorn.

dialogues.speaker: . FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Right-- and With the Blade Of The Unicorn I will slay Leezar! Fabious raises a fist. The ROYAL STAFF cheers his courage. Thadeous steps up.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: And I will wish you good luck, brother. It was nice to have you back, as short as the visit was. We will look forward to the next time. Goodbye. Get lost. Thadeous raises a fist. The crowd is awkwardly silent. King Tallious glares at Thadeous.

dialogues.speaker: CCONTTNUED \
dialogues.text: 23 24 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 32.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: Save your words, Thadeous for you will be accompanying him. Thadeous is caught completely off guard. He fumbles unprepared. Julie smiles smugly. KING TALLIOUS (CONT’D) It is time for you to become a man ONCE AND FOR ALL. On the open road of a treacherous quest! You must journey with your brother to save Belladonna!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Not interested. You want me to go on a quest let’s start with something easy, like finding treasure or beating off in front of a pegasus. Beginner’s shit.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: You have neglected my authority and the heritage of this kingdom for far too long. This expedition will prove you are a man worthy to bear the family shield.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: What if I run away right now and hide and you can’t find me? What would happen then?

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: The choice is yours Thadeous: You can pack your bags and accompany your brother or pack your bags and enjoy banishment from this castle. Thadeous just stands there as all eyes are on him. The Great White Wizard exhales another big hit. Him and the White Wizard lock eyes. And then without moving his mouth, the Great White Wizard speaks through Thadeous’ mind.

dialogues.speaker: THE GREAT WHITE WIZARD
dialogues.text: You are fucked. INT. LEEZAR’S TOWER - DAY 24 Belladonna’s eyes SNAP awake. Unsure of her surroundings. She lays in the center of a pillowy bed, wrapped in the white silks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 24 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 33.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: The room around her is like that of a LONELY LITTLE RICH GIRL. Pale colors, lace fabric, a small carousel, a puppet theater, giant dolls, etc.

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA
dialogues.text: Hello?

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Welcome home. Leezar APPEARS by the window and turns.

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA
dialogues.text: Stay away from me!

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Your anger will not last. True happiness awaits upon your submission to my kiss. Leezar points out the narrow window to THE TWIN MOONS, both little more than slivers that punctuate the day sky like parenthesis slowly marching towards each other. LEEZAR (CONT’D) Looky there. The Twin Moons appear almost as halves rather than wholes, fragments of a form... Now we know tis but a trick of the eye and yon moons drift complete as ever... Looks can be decieving. Leezar smiles a wicked grin and claps his hands.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I have raised you in eager anticipation of their eclipse. Just as the moons unite... So will you and I. He kisses her lips. She spits in his face.

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA
dialogues.text: You'll regret this! Fabious will return for me. Those ugly eyes I look into now will bleed by the blade of Fabious’ sword!

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: That’s actually not true. One, Fabious will never make it back to this tower to save you. I'll make sure of that. And two, I’m charmed my dear. Blades and swords can do me no harm. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 24 25 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 34.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Fabious’ mighty sword is useless against me, steel, bronze, all-- Belladonna whips a dinner fork out of her dress and stabs it into Leezar’s hand that’s against the wall. Leezar calmly looks to his hand pinned to the wall.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What is this?

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA
dialogues.text: It’s a fork. It’s for EATING! He shakes his head and pulls the fork out of his hand. The wound instantly heals before Belladonna’s eyes.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Didn’t I just say this sort of thing can’t hurt me? Shame. Your anger for me clouds your judgement. But it’s not your fault. I locked you in here alone for all those years. Never showing you attention nor love. Why wouldn’t you want to leave or stab a dinner utensil through my hand? This time it will be different. I will pay you more attention. When we fulfill the prophecy together I hope that it can be an act of love as opposed to, well, you know, rape. Rape is so rude. In the meantime... make yourself at home. Leezar turns and disappears from the room. Belladonna is left all alone. She runs to the window and screams

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fabious walks determined. Sweeping shots of THE ROYAL PARTY traveling through the countryside. The Royal Knights and Carriages move along ON HORSEBACK. Boremont leads the gang of GUARDIAN WARRIORS: MANIOUS THE BOLD, tall, ugly and medieval. THUNDARIAN, a ripped up black dude on steroids. DARONIOUS THE SWIFT, carries two handgun sized CROSSBOWS from his side like a gunslinger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 35.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: THE BROTHERS MEIN, two identical bad ass Asian martial arts dudes.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: We will follow the Highlands into Muldiss Darton. If we ride fast it should be uneventful.

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: Aye, your Highness. But what adventure doesn’t hold a twist or a turn? Fabious laughs. Boremont sniffs the air. Then looks over his shoulder to Thadeous’ carriage. BOREMONT (CONT’D) So, does he plan on remaining in his foul smelling carriage the entire quest?

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: He is here to learn, Boremont. It is not our place to judge.

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: It is a wonder you were cut from the same cloth. If there ever were two men who were more different-

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: We were cut from the exact same cloth. My father’s dick. Let no man forget. I would give my life for Thadeous.

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: Noble, Fabious. I’m sure he’d do the same for you.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: My love for him relies not on his actions.

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: That is a good thing, Your Highness. A good thing indeed. 26 INT. THADEOUS’ ROYAL CARRIAGE - DAY 26 Thadeous puffs away on joint. He lays on fancy pillows. Courtney sits beside him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 36.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: You see Courtney. I alone understand how to properly prepare for an adventure. Comfortable garments, soft pillows to lay upon. How much booze did we bring?

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Ten barrels of mead, and fifteen cases of whiskey Your Highness.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Hopefully this journey will not be too stressful or boring. Either way, I'd prefer to be wasted the entire time if no one objects. And how is Steven doing? Courtney looks to a large fancy pillow where STEVEN, A FAT GILA MONSTER, sits.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: He seems fine I guess, Sir.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Fabious has Simon, and now I have Steven. A far superior creature companion wouldn’t you agree? Steven just sits there motionless.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: I’m sure he’ll be most useful. Thadeous nods. He takes another hit, then sniffs.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I smell something gross? Did you break wind?

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: I believe Steven has shit himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Camp is being set up for the evening in a forest of STATUE RUINS from an ancient time. Courtney cleans stains out of Thadeous’ Carriage. Steven sits tied to a tree. The Guardian Warriors finish building a fire. Thadeous comes out of a large tent with a BOTTLE OF BOOZE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 37.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Here thee all brave knights who stand before me. I propose a toast, let us drink until thine asses are drunk! He gulps from the bottle and hands it to Manious.

dialogues.speaker: MANIOUS THE BOLD
dialogues.text: Aye, no thank you, Prince.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: This is the finest Goat’s piss that shall ever touch your lips. What are you a flat cock?

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Brother, we do not celebrate until we complete the quest at hand. Tis code of the Knights Elite.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Pfft. Code? How about MY code? Where we all drink like shepherds and get shitfaced.

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: Thadeous, WE DO have traditions of our own. One of which seems appropriate for this occasion. The carcass of a WILD HORNED BOAR is stuck on a stick and about to be spit roasted over the blazing fire.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: You will enjoy this, brother. Thundarian the Colossus, prepare the warrior’s tiding, if you will. Thundarian rolls up his sleeves.

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: Tradition ordains that on the first night of a quest we partake of the warrior’s tidings to strengthen our bond by devouring the heart of a boar. Thundarian winks to Thadeous, then plunges his hand into the boar’s chest and removes its melon sized HEART.

dialogues.speaker: THUNDARIAN
dialogues.text: -And if it is the FIRST night of your FIRST quest... well...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 27 28 29 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 38.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Sly grins all around as Thundarian turns and offers the HEART to a very queasy looking Thadeous. Simon CAWS.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I think I’1l pass.

dialogues.speaker: MANIOUS
dialogues.text: It’s a tradition among men!

dialogues.speaker: THUNDARIAN
dialogues.text: Every man must partake!

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: Lest we be cursed...! Thundarian shakes the disgusting, blood filled organ in Thad’s face who reluctantly takes it only to find the sucker is slippery. Finally he gets a hold of it. The knights start chanting.

dialogues.speaker: ALL KNIGHTS
dialogues.text: Eat it! Eat it! Eat it! Thadeous looks to his brother for help but Fabious has joined in. His attention returns to the heart as he slowly draws it closer and closer to his mouth...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Across the camp, the back flap of one of the larger tents is opened, and a shadowy figure emerges. It’s JULIE.

dialogues.speaker: KNIGHTS, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: ‘Eat it! Eat it! Eat it... Julie smiles to himself, slipping away from camp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julie positions a small GEM STONE that hangs by a string from a tree. He then kneels in the dirt and opens his satchel. He removes four crystals that fit together like a puzzle to form a small 8 inch clear PYRAMID. He then finds a small WOODEN BOX in his bag and twists several chambers like a Rubix Cube. He reaches into his mouth and pulls out one of his back teeth. He plants the root of the tooth into the wooden box. It lights up and shoots a beam of light into the gem on the tree that reflects a rainbow prism into the pyramid. He recites an incantation: (CONTTNUED )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 29 30 “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 39.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Uraylot, puffy muff, fuucous, guttoon... As he hums these weird words, the rainbow colors merge in the pyramid, and finally becomes a trippy HOLOGRAM OF LEEZAR'S FACE... Active and communicating...

dialogues.speaker: JULIE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (secretively) Your most dedicated servant Julie with a report, Master Leezar. We have crossed the Hazel meadows on our way to Muldiss Darton. We rest for the night near the Cliffs of Kuneman. Leezar’s floating head gazes at Julie who respectfully bows, neither scoundrel aware of the figure in the bushes watching: COURTNEY SEES IT ALL WHILE TAKING A PISS.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Very well. Now that Dubris’ finest warriors have left the stronghold, their vulnerability is in your hands. See that they get no closer to me. Poison them as they sleep.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Very well Master. Scared shitless, Courtney shakes his dick and runs. INT. THADEOUS’ TENT - MOMENTS LATER 30 The rowdy laughter of the knights can still be heard.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: I can’t believe you made me do that! Leave me alone! Thadeous comes storming inside, the front of his wardrobe splattered with puke stains. Fabious follows.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Thadeous calm down, really. The initiation is over. You passed!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I puked all over myself in front of your stupid friends! Just then Courtney, wheezing from running, bursts in. (CONTTNURD 1)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness” - Draft 15th April 2009 40.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Forgive my intrusion, Sirs, but I was taking a piss and witnessed a most disturbing incident...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Courtney leads Thadeous and Fabious through forest.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: There must be a misunderstanding. Julie has been my most trusted confidant, I just can’t-

dialogues.speaker: JULIE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: You can’t what, Your Highnessses? They are startled as Julie steps out of the shadows. The lantern reveals the serious look on Fabious’ face.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Is it true? How could you Julie?

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Easily. Quite easily in fact. At that moment Julie whips two of the BRIGHTLY LIT GEM STONES from his robe and strikes them together creating a BLINDING FLASH right in Thadeous and Fabious’ eyes!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Oh fuck! My eyes!!!

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: We’ve been FLASH BLINDED! Julie smashes their heads into a tree and BOLTS away. The brothers try to follow blinded and dizzy.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Courtney, murder him for me! Without hesitation Courtney DARTS OFF LIKE A CHEETAH. Julie seems to have a good lead until he glances over his shoulder and spots Courtney. BAM! COURTNEY TACKLES JULIE and the two fight in some hand to hand combat. Fabious and Thadeous move BLINDLY through the woods behind them.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Where are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 41.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I'm right here.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: I can’t .see you!

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: (yelling to Fabious) Okay?! We're fighting! Now what?! Fabious and Thadeous catch up and open their eyes to watch the fight already in progress.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Kill him!!!

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: No! Just hold him Courtney! Restrain him with all your might! Courtney wrestles Julie, holding him with both arms as he kicks and flails. Then JULIE SHRIEKS LIKE A CAT IN HEAT! Fabious and Thadeous run up as JULIE tears away from Courtney’s grip. Courtney STILL HANGS ONTO HIS ROBE. Thadeous and Fabious regain their vision, and everyone GASPS at the sight before them. Julie stands NUDE FROM HEAD TO TOE, a pale body with one disturbing detail: HE HAS NO GENITALS. Just a smooth skinned KEN DOLL crotch.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Julie, doesn’t have a dick!

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: How unfortunate!

dialogues.speaker: JULIE HISSES AND ATTACKS USING HIS FINGER NAILS AS CLAWS
dialogues.text: More demon-cat now than human, he becomes a hissing and scratching, dickless tornado, clawing at everyone! Fabious kicks Julie away. He hits the ground, recovers, and darts into the forest. Fabious, Thadeous, and Courtney chase after Julie. FABIOUS (CONT’D) Julie hissed at me!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I’m running ‘on an upset stomach!  32 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 42.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fabious, Thadeous, and Courtney run into the large tent.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Boremont! A turncoat has been discovered! Boremont turns. Julie hides behind him, nervously.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Boremont, seize Julie. I’m afraid he has betrayed us! Thadeous, totally pissed and pointing.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: That THING is a traitor and a disgusting Eunuch!

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: A traitor you say? Well that is most unfortunate. But what is more unfortunate for you, is that he is not the only one. Julie’s shivering stops and he smiles wickedly.

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What were our Master’s orders? Fabious’ jaw goes tight.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: The orders were simple. Kill Fabious and leave the chubby one as brunch for the beasts of the wilderness! Boremont and The Rest of the Elite Knights UNSHEATHE their SWORDS.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Boremont, how could you?! We were friends and what about the code of the Knights Elite?

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: “Code”, you ask? Upon your choice of best man, your “code” became clear to me. I’m ready to serve a Master that appreciates what I do for him. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 32 33 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 43.

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Like Leezar will appreciate how I dispose of you and that sack of shit. Thadeous looks offended. Thundarian And Manious move in. FABIOUS JUMP KICKS them both sending them flying into the crates of LIQUOR which shatter. He slings the lantern at them sending them both ablaze! The TWO MEN SCREAM as they burn alive. Thadeous grabs a sword, trying to keep the BROTHERS MEIN away. Fabious has a quick swordfight with Daronious and then slays him. Before Boremont can move in, Fabious KICKS DOWN THE TENT’S CENTER BEAM! It collapses on them all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With a RIP, Fabious emerges from the tent. He wastes no time taking advantage of the situation by KICKING the shit out of and STABBING every crawling lump under the canvas. Thadeous and Courtney get out and follow suit.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS _
dialogues.text: They were going to KILL US!

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: It certainly appears that way. But the Princes of Dubris are not undone so easily! Quick! Those horses! Fabious darts to THE HORSES and mounts one. Courtney mounts another. Thadeous stands beside another one, uncertain. From beneath the tent, the traitors are trying to cut an exit.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I don't like riding on horses fast. Especially while being pursued.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: What? COURTNEY. Tis true. His majesty hates riding horses fast.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: We'll have to think of another way to escape. (CONT TNURED )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 33 34 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 44,

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Fabious takes a deep breath and then sees Boremont emerge from the tent. Fabious snatches his brother’s arm, and jumps up onto his horse.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: NOW! - Hold on! Fabious gives the horse a kick and they’re off! Julie, and the battered traitors emerge from the tent.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Catch them! They mount the remaining horses. The chase begins...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fab and Thad power through the forest as branches whip by them. Courtney rides better than you’d think.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Your Highnesses, we have company!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I’m not looking. I’m just going to keep my eyes closed and pretend that none of this is happening! Fab looks over his shoulder and spots The BROTHERS MEIN coming up fast. The brothers split up to take Fabious horse from both sides.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Thadeous, I’m going to need you to take the reins.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: The Brothers Mein draw their swords and narrow the distance. THADEOUS (CONT’D) Oh shit. Fabious leaps from his horse and dives onto one of the approaching Mein’s horse. He knocks the sword out of the man’s hand, punches him in the face and then tosses him off the horse and gains control.. Thad is holding the reins of the horse and screaming bloody murder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 34 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 45.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: THADEOUS (CONT’D) Too fast! Too fast! Help! The remaining Brother Mein smiles as he draws his blade and prepares to strike at Thadeous... WHOOSH! Fabious swings his sword finding it’s mark right through the remaining Mein’s chest. He drops dead. Fab then leaps back onto the horse with Thad. Courtney blazes ahead. Fabious kicks the horse into over drive as Julie approaches from behind. Julie loads a crossbow... The arrow goes sailing right past their heads. Courtney and Thadeous turn around and spot Julie. THADEOUS (CONT’D) Dickless is back and he’s shooting arrows!!

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Duck! Fabious steers the horse quickly to the left. Taking a narrow path over a fallen tree. A huge branch goes right over their heads as they duck holding each other. Julie is too busy reloading to notice the branch. WHAM! He smashes into the tree face first and is tossed like a rag doll to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Uh, what are we doing, brother?

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: We're doing revenge! Fabious gives the horse a kick.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Can we pull over, I may throw up again. Boremont rides up to Julie and halts his horse.

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: Get up!

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: The obstacles were unavoidable.

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: Save your excuses. They know not where they stray... (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 34 35 “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 46.

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Strange danger awaits them in the Valley of Mount Dithens... Regret soon falls upon the sons of the great King Tallious. A smile curves across his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fabious, Thadeous, and Courtney have stopped in a swamp to water their horses.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: These turn of events have thrown us entirely off course. We have no idea where we are! We'll never get to Muldiss Darton without the protection of guardians... And I have no carriage! Fabious turns, full of passion.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Granted our pilgrimage will be more challenging and our road uncertain, but this does not mean we surrender the quest. My love awaits rescue! I would risk our lives to save her.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: No way! Quest cancelled. This has become dangerous! I promise you’1l rescue more ladies in your life. Let’s go home and test to see if you still miss Belladonna. Just then that FAMILIAR SQUAWKING... SIMON THE MECHANICAL CROW flies on to a nearby branch. Fabious looks to him.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Simon. Where have you been? Where were you when I needed you?! Simon CAWS. Thadeous suddenly goes pale, remembering--

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Oh fuck! Courtney and Fabious spin around--

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: What is it? (CONTTNURD )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 47.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I left goddamn Steven back at camp.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: What? Who’s Steven?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: He’s my loyal animal companion. He’s just as important to ME as Simon is to YOU! But I guess I’11 never see him again!

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Very well. I understand that bond. It’s not ideal but if it’s what we have to do, then we’ll do it. Let us return to camp, face the traitors, and rescue STEVEN!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: No, fuck it. It’s over. Simon CAWS. Thadeous eyes him. THADEOUS (CONT’D) Perhaps it is only fair since my animal companion is gone, you should get rid of yours too.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: That would serve no purpose, Thadeous. It would be the same as me asking you to get rid of Courtney because Julie is no longer with us.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I'll get rid of Courtney. I'11 push him into that quicksand right now if it means fair is fair.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: I don’t like that idea.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Simon can help us. Simon, take this message to Father. Simon BLINKS and BEEPS. FABIOUS (CONT’D) Tell him the Elite Knights betrayed us. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 35 36 37 “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 48.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Tell him to send an army across the valley. Tell them to meet us in Muldiss Darton to help claim the Sword of the Unicorn. Hurry. Fly now to Dubris, Simon, and deliver these desperate words! We must run to find my love. We haven’t a moment to lose! Simon BLINKS and flies away. Thadeous watches him go. EXT. TOWER OF DISORDER - NIGHT 36. The TWO MOONS continue to rise above Leezar’s Dark Tower. INT. LEEZAR’S LAIR/DINING HALL - NIGHT 37 THE ROBED WITCHES from the wedding enter the dark hall led by Mother #1. The Arabic looking room of melting candles and pillows is set for a feast. Leezar lays beside Belladonna who is IN CHAINS and dressed provocatively.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Nice of you to finally join us, mothers. I have prepared the perfect feast for all of the important women in my life.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: We are eager to witness your consecration. Leezar combs Belladonna’s hair and smells her.

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA
dialogues.text: Your touch disgusts me! Leezar smiles and stuffs a napkin in her mouth so she can’t speak. He recomposes himself.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Mothers, I know you know who Belladonna is, but I don’t believe you REALLY know who she is. And tonight I’ve arranged this meal so that we can all take a step towards learning more about one another.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 37 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 49,

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Mother #3 She spits 37

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Soon the prophecy of our council will be fulfilled and darkness shall return to the land as it did one thousand years ago. chews her food with distaste.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Leezar?! What is this rubbish you have set before us?

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Why it is bean scoops, wheat toast, and fish fingers. it out on her plate. Belladonna rolls her eyes. LEEZAR (CONT’D) Are you not pleased with my cooking? The other mothers spit out bites of their own. Another Mother enters the room.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Aye, Mothers! We've received word from the Minstrel Julie. A devilish smile creeps across Leezar’s face.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Give word. Have my minions given them food poisoning? Have the children of King Tallious been struck with thunderbolts across thyn eyes?!

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: They are still alive. Julie said they tracked them as far as the Valley of Mount Dithens.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: You fool. You should have killed the Sons of Tallious when you had the chance! Belladonna spits the gag out of her mouth.

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA
dialogues.text: The will of my love is too great. I don’t care of what dismay these bitches tell. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 50.

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: My prince and his strange brother will arrive here in due time. MOTHER #1 slaps her and puts back in the gag.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Thank you, Mother. But I can handle. her myself.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: We’ve gone to great lengths to ensure that nothing would stand in the way. Your grandfather Josh failed a hundred years ago. Foiled by the Golden Order of Knights. And what have we done for you?

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: You’ve killed the Golden Order of Knights.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: We tracked down the blood line of the order and delivered each of them to their doom. And why did we do this?

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: SO there would be no one to stand in our way.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: So there’d be no one to stand in our way.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: So why is there now someone standing in the way! Leezar snatches his staff and holds it up... ready to attack. Blue bolts of electricity singe around the Mother’s fingers. They lock eyes. Leezar calms and lowers his wand. Belladonna is spooked at the domestic quarrel.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Mind your place. I will fulfill the prophecy and when I control the beast I will control the world. You'd be wise to remember that. Nothing will stand in my way. Certainly not two foolish princes. Mount Dithens is Marteetee’s land. (MORE) (CONTTNUED )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 37 38 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 51.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I will contact the mad faggot and make sure he finishes them. Now if it’s not too much to ask may we enjoy this fucking delicious buffet I have prepared? Leezar holds a fish finger up to Belladonna’s lips. EXT. VALLEY OF MOUNT DITHENS — DAY 38 Fabious, Thadeous, and Courtney are on their horses making their way through the trees and a strange tribal looking MYSTERIOUS FOREST.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: (singing) Not even fatigue could dampen the raging fire of revenge. Thadeous wished for the traitors lives to end... He swore he would... uh, I’m drawing a blank.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: (singing) .-.lay waste to them?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: No. Something bolder. He swore he would slash their faces with cuts from his sword! Fabious who's been listening the whole time begins to sing without even looking back at them.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: ---He swore that for these crimes he'd show no mercy. Put his blade to work so fiercely, never rest on any quest ‘til every drop of blood was flooded from the hearts beneath these villain’s breasts! Courtney and Thadeous exchange a look.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
