dialogues.text: That, Courtney. Write that down. That’s what brave Prince Thadeous swore to do. Not bad Brother. Not bad at all.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Thanks. They hear a CLICKING SOUND in the woods as they move.

dialogues.speaker: CCONTTNITED 1
dialogues.text: 38 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 52.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Hark! Listen! Thadeous steps closer to his brother for protection. Standing twenty feet in front of them, a tall white haired PALE SKINNED topless BEAUTY with perfect breasts.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Whoa! Who the hell is that? The beauty smiles and summons him with her finger. She turns and disappears behind some trees. Thadeous climbs off his horse to follow her.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Thadeous, no!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: She might be in distress and need my help.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: We haven’t time for promiscuity! From behind the tree the VIXEN lets out a playful giggle.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Trust me. I'll make it quick! Thadeous struts into the woods and disappears. Fabious sighs and turns to Courtney.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Sometimes I think he doesn’t care about this quest.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: What on Earth makes you think that?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Oh shit!!! Thadeous comes running back out full speed. He’s crying.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS ', (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Run!!! Suddenly, from around the same corner steps the Vixen and TEN OTHER PALE BLONDE TOPLESS BEAUTIES like her. They approach Thadeous with violent looking primitive weapons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 38 39 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 53.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: They turn to escape in the other direction, but discover they are surrounded on all sides. The boys freeze.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: White People! - I knew it! The White People move closer, CLICKING THEIR tongues and GRUNTING in a strange mountain speak.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: It must be a trap set by Leezar. Thadeous looks to see several of them HUMPING trees aggressively.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Eww. What do we do?

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: I don’t know. T’is against the code to strike a woman.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I've had enough of your codes! Punch them in the face! THWICK-- A dart sticks in Thadeous’ neck. A PALE AMAZON WOMAN sends a dart flying into Courtney’s neck. Then another hits Fabious. All three look to each other.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: This is so fucked up. Our heroes pass out. Courtney falls off his horse. CUT TO BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fabious awakens slowly. Thadeous and Courtney are beside him in a DARK CELL alive with FIVE OTHER PRISONERS.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Where have they taken us?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Are we dead? A HOODED PRISONER steps from the shadows.

dialogues.speaker: HOODED PRISONER
dialogues.text: Not yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 39 40 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 54.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: The sound of distant CHEERS and DRUMS bounce around the walls. A SKINNY PRISONER starts crying and moaning:

dialogues.speaker: SKINNY PRISONER
dialogues.text: No please. Please not me. Please don’t pick me!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: What’s he going on about? Sounds like a chamber maid on her period.

dialogues.speaker: HOODED WARRIOR
dialogues.text: If you knew what he knew, you'd be on your knees as well. A DOOR open to reveal a OUTSIDE LARGE ARENA in a primitive tribal looking rock quarry compound. One end of the floor drops out and they slide out of the cell. INT. ARENA — CONTINUOUS 40 The doors SHUT BEHIND THEM. The crowd surrounding the cave is a sea of PALE, TALL, MEN’S FACES standing behind bars like psycho albino prisoners with clay in their hair and DNA marred by the generations of inbreeding.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: (to Thadeous) See what happens when you follow your selfish desires?! I knew the woman in the bushes was a trap. This could be a major setback. MARTEETEE rises. A dirty, no teeth, grotesquely obese man, with WHITE SKIN AND RED EYES. He wears a TURBAN and is escorted to a balcony overlooking the arena, where he is lavished upon by the BEAUTIFUL FEMALES of his species who rub oils on him. FACES OF LOST SOULS yawn and moan within the walls.

dialogues.speaker: MARTEETEE
dialogues.text: Yes! YES! We found you! Rub me and tend to me my little beans! Pleasure my senses to EXCESS! Welcome. Welcome friends of Leeeeezar!!! On the arena floor:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 55.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: A Rodeo of Death! A secret tradition practiced by the mountain mortals for centuries and commanded by Marteetee.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: What the fuck is Marteetee? Up on the balcony:

dialogues.speaker: MARTEETEE
dialogues.text: Good day today. Welcome to my most special of games! I promised Leezar your heads will roll! Thad turns around as a group of MILKY INBREEDS unlatch a huge lock and crank open a MASSIVE STEEL HATCH...

dialogues.speaker: MARTEETEE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Yes my pretties! Tis time to play so I can watch! Oh how I watch thee prancing through my heart’s desires! Enter my bulbus! ENTER

dialogues.speaker: DASTARDLY
dialogues.text: Aggressive MUSIC KICKS in. A fully clothed man, well built and extraordinarily good looking: DASTARDLY enters with long 80’s rockstar hair. He is heavily armed with daggers, swords’ and leather accessories. The crowd goes wild. Dastardly begins what seems to be some sort of medieval strip tease as he juggles knives and gyrates in sexual gestures that seem dangerous considering the sharp metal he’s playing with. He stalks one of the prisoners and after some fancy sword spinning, he stab him to the death and then takes his shirt off. The crowd sweats in their cages.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Oh shit, I don’t like this a bit!

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Brother. If I am killed in this arena, will you give me your word to continue our quest? The future of the kingdom is at stake.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Of course!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 40 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 56.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Of course what?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I will... keep doing quest. A blade is thrown at Thadeous. With lighting fast speed, Fabious pushes Thad out of the way and snatches the blade. He jumps into the center of the arena. Dastardly bumps and grinds and feeds the crowd kisses. Marteetee blows kisses right back and drinks a goblet of wine. Without skipping a beat, Fabious maneuvers weaponless, trying to find his entrance to the fight as Dastardly dances and tosses his long hair around. Fabious makes a graceful rampage approach as he runs and leaps off a rock, tumbles on the ground, uses his leg to sweep the leg out from under Dastardly. He quickly grabs one of his swords and gets to his feet. Dastardly finds his stance as well and the fight is on. As the even match continues, we see why he is the warrior and hero called upon for a lifetime of adventure. - When Dastardly falls with a blade through his heart... Fabious raises his arms in bloodthirsty victory. THADEOUS (CONT’D) Oh Gods... I can’t breathe. That was insane. Where did you learn how to do that? Fabious spits. The crowd hushes. Marteetee stirs...

dialogues.speaker: MARTEETEE
dialogues.text: Most impressive in your violent ticklings! Now step back for my child of wonder! WHERE ARE YOU?!!! An exhale of cool wind and dust drifts from the hole into the air... quiet waiting, then: THE SCREAM OF A VERY

dialogues.speaker: LARGE BEAST
dialogues.text: MARTEETEE (CONT’D) YES MY PET! Come forth and kill, kill, kill, with thy wicked jaws!! The captives run as a MONSTER the size of a large man comes squealing out. It looks like a pleasant/retarded mix of a Baby seal and a medieval Mr. Potatohead. It’s eyes are where his nipples are supposed to be. Meet: NIPPLE-EYE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 40 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 57.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Observe this unsightly freak. I will gouge him with my finger and show that true bravery runs in our family. In an instant, as its legs and head remain still, the torso of the monster turns 180 degrees to reveal the alter-ego of this two faced beast: Hideous and far more sinister features... Thadeous and Courtney scream bloody murder as they run for it. Nipple-Eye comes at them quick... Fabious tries to keep up but loses his footing, and jumps to the left just as Nipple-Eye pierces the Skinny Prisoner with the reveal of its switchblade bone arm. The CROWD CHEERS and bangs on their bars COURTNEY AND THADEOUS run to the far side of the cave... THADEOUS (CONT’D) Drop back! The slowest one gets eaten. Make the sacrifice, Courtney!

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Fuck that! Courtney runs backwards and gets grabbed through cage bars by the prisoners. He struggles. Marteetee eats something disgusting on his perch. The harem around him soothes his tumors.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Fabious, quick, do more of that fighting! Nipple-eye corners Fabious... Fabious freezes. The beast slinks back... then it opens its jaw. A very long TONGUE ejects from within. The tongue shoots out of Nipple-Eye’s mouth and slaps the sword out of Fabious’ hand, before he can move the tongue wraps around his neck! Fabious fights and plays tug-of-war with the tongue, as Nipple Eye tries to pull him within reach. Marteetee and the crowd CHEER!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 40 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 58.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Fabious struggles to keep his distance and air. The tongue holds strong, choking him out.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: the--sword, Thadeous--use it! Cut me free! Nipple eye gets frustrated and roars as Fabious pulls hard on his tongue.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I can’t-- I

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: You can! Thadeous sees the sword and hesitates... FABIOUS (CONT’D) cut it! Thadeous closes his eyes and wildly swings the sword. Nipple Eye ROARS in pain. Thadeous opens his eyes and sees that miraculously he’s hit the tongue, nearly severing it off. Blood sprays from cut tongue. The CROWD loves it! The half of the tongue that’s still connected is holding strong. Fabious gasps for air!

dialogues.speaker: --AGAIN
dialogues.text: Thadeous raises the sword, he swings with all his might and misses the tongue completely. The sword goes flying out of his hands and lands in the dirt way out of reach. Nipple Eye runs to Thadeous and pushes him across the arena. He hits the dirt hard. He drags Fabious from the grip of his tongue. Fabious is about to be choked out...with all his might he pulls hard ripping the cut wide open, until he rips the tongue a part! Fabious catches his breath. Nipple Eye screams in agony.. The HOODED PRISONER begins BANGING on the wall loudly to draw the beast’s attention, while WHITE PEOPLE GUARDS lunge through their caged wall and violate Courtney. The Hooded Prisoner holds the sword Thadeous lost.

dialogues.speaker: HOODED PRISONER
dialogues.text: Come for me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 40 “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 59.

dialogues.speaker: MARTEETEE
dialogues.text: And who have we here then? A sprightly little fighter you are! Nipple Eye turns and charges the Hooded Prisoner. With sword in hand, the prisoner fights bravely against the beast and dodges swipes of its bone sword. Fabious looks to his brother, picks up a rock and slings it at Nipple Eye.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Your time has come!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: No, no. We killed the last one, we did our share. It’s that asshole’s turn to fight now. Nipple Eye turns from The Prisoner and ROARS at them. It rears back about to charge the royal brothers when- The Hooded Prisoner jumps onto the creature’s back. GREEN BLOOD pours out as the warrior drills the sword into the back of the monster’s vulnerable neck tissue. The monster drops in a fit of spasms. Dead. The mysterious warrior cuts off a SIX INCH SPIKE that grows on the beast’s back and holds it up in victory. Marteetee throws a tantrum in the stands.

dialogues.speaker: MARTEETEE
dialogues.text: My baby! Who is he that dares destroy my beautiful baby! The CROWD is silent. Thad is impressed from his hiding place. The warrior pulls the sword out of the creature's neck and turns to Marteetee... pulls down the hood to reveal, LONG FLOWING HAIR OF THE BEAUTIFUL... ISABEL.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Two weeks ago, three of my brothers were captured by you and slaughtered by that beast. Today I avenge them. First by killing the beast. Second by killing you, Marteetee! Prepare to have your asshole punched out through your dickhole in a violent circumcision of death! The crowd goes ape shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 40 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 60.

dialogues.speaker: MARTEETEE
dialogues.text: Well, well my tiny bean, it looks like the most glorious show of all is about. to begin. GET HER! The gates open and ALBINO INBRED GUARDS storm the arena after her. She’s too fast, she defends herself like an ACTION HERO, snatching one of their swords, slashing her way through the guards! Thadeous and Fabious rise from their hiding. No one is paying any attention to them as they try to sneak toward the main gate. All forces are trying to beat down Isabel... Thadeous is fixated...

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: She's incredible.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Should we help her?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: She seems to be doing fine on her own. Nipple Eye SPRINGS BACK TO LIFE! It screams as it rises for the attack again! Thadeous screams as he sees the massive bone blade swinging his way, hot on his ass! It flails around in seizure, crashing right into the holding cells of the prisoners. The weight of his massive frame CRUSHES the small structures, FREEING THE PRISONERS. Nipple-Eye ricochets toward the balcony and knocks over a support post. The balcony collapses on top of the beast, spilling Marteetee onto the arena floor. He screams like a bitch as his escaped captives devour him.

dialogues.speaker: MARTEETEE
dialogues.text: Don’t touch me. Love me! I fucking’ love you! CRUNCH. He’s dead. Isabel stands near...

dialogues.speaker: TO BE MINE
dialogues.text: Fabious grabs Isabel by the shoulder as she tries to make her way through the crowd of albinos.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Come on! (CONTTNURED )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 40 41 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 61.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Fabious drags Isabel and Thad. As they escape, Courtney slams the gate latch, sealing the circus of freaks in the arena.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gang, now armed, comes running out of the woods, to a clearing by a waterfall. They catch their breath. Thadeous and Isabel circle each other.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: You almost had me killed back there!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Wench, who do you think you are? You can’t speak to me that way. Courtney, tell her who I am! Courtney steps forward and sings:

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Oh brave, oh brave Prince Thadeous-

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Never heard of you.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: This bickering must stop. We have greater tasks at hand!

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: I don’t know what your tasks are, and frankly I don’t give a shit.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: (to Isabel) Listen here, Amazon. We must get one thing straight, I am not to be talked down to. So speak to me with that foul tongue again, and I'll- In one swift move, Isabel GRABS THADEOUS’ DICK.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: You'll do nothing before I tear the package from between your legs like I tore this horn from the beast. I will wear it round my neck... (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 41 42 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 62.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (holding the horn) A souvenir of my kill! Courtney gulps as she immediately pulls away from Thadeous and begins to remove her war gear.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Now if you’ll excuse me, I wish to wash this stench off me. And with that, she removes the last piece of her gear to reveal: ISABEL WEARING A “RED SONYA” WARRIOR BIKINI, her body is smoking hot. He watches her dive into the pond. Fabious walks up.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Adventurous slut.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: She knows her way around a foe, brother. Perhaps she can lead us to Muldiss Darton so we can get back on the path.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our Heroes have geared up and are ready for the next leg of the adventure. Isabel gathers her things. Fabious and Thadeous both look at her. Fabious nods for Thadeous to speak to her. Thadeous loses his nerve and shakes his head “No”

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: My name is Prince Fabious of Dubris, and this is my dear brother Thadeous and his’ minstrel Courtney. We'd like to thank you for your help with the beast in that cave.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: You handled the stripping swordsman. I appreciate that as well. I have no time for small banter though. My quest continues to the North.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: What a coincidence! We too are on a most important quest and we need your help. Can you guide us to Muldiss Darton?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 63.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: I have fought in the Crusades at Londorian, braved the ice tombs of Korlack, and traversed the hell deserts of Thinley. Now I am on the most important quest of all. Why should I slow my swagger to lead you? Just then Courtney comes up with a pair of underwear.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Here sir, I have cleaned your soiled undergarments. Thadeous snatches them out of Courtney’s hand and sticks them down his pants.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Not soiled, merely--

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: If you're heading north, you boys may journey with me to Muldiss Darton. From there I seek navigation and march alone.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: We thank you. And if we may, what is your name?

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: I am Isabel. The last living member of the Harshbarger order.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Well, okay. Now then, despite the foul way in which you have spoken to me, my brother and I will ensure that you will have nothing to fear while you travel with us. With our sharp blades we will protect you. Fear not! Isabel looks to Fabious like he’s out of his mind.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: We will look out for each other equally, I feel certain.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: But we'll still be looking out for you, more...Because we’re men. (CONTTNURD 1)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 42 43 44 45 "Your Highness" -— Draft 15th April 2009 64.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Isabel stares at his tights and raises an eye-brow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Belladonna -looks out her window at the celestial happenings... Constellations, shooting stars, moons moving, etc. She sings an absurd, but emotional and somewhat expository song about “The Shitty Moons”.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fabious sits under the moons on the bank of a river. He looks out to the night. He awkwardly begins singing the same song as Belladonna...

dialogues.speaker: BETWEEN BELLADONNA AND FABIOUS SINGING, AS THE
dialogues.text: SONG BECOMES A DUET, until--

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Are you singing? Fabious instantly stops singing.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: No, I was just out here... uh, by the river, not singing. Thadeous looks at him suspicious. Fabious shrugs. Isabel approaches.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: We need food. If we pause now, I will hunt. Who will join me? Fabious looks to Thadeous.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: My feet are killing me. You two should... take care of business.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Isabel stalks the forest, stepping quietly with her bow and arrow drawn on the trail of dinner. Up ahead, a movement in the brush. A DEER wanders from the bush. Thadeous comes stomping out of nowhere, swinging his sword recklessly. The deer is startled and runs away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 65.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: May I ask what you are doing?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Hunting. What does it look like I’m doing?

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Ruining my chances to catch dinner.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Quiet your tongue, my lass. I come from a long line of swordsmen, and won't be told that I don’t know how to compose myself. Thadeous takes aim on a few reeds, attempting to show his skills. He’s doing his “eyes closed, wild man sword swing” and finishes with a half bow.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Perhaps you should open your eyes when you swing your blade. The chances of hitting your target greatly improve. Isabel snatches the sword from Thad’s hands and shows him a real demonstration of skill, swinging the blade with poise and grace over and under and slashing mere breaths from Thadeous’ nethers. She points her blade as he covers his crotch.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I see. He leans close and whispers: THADEOUS (CONT’D) It appears you are now ready to surrender to my temptations?

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: You have much confidence, Thadeous. But I know the feel of your cock in my hand, and would not be so quick to boast. Shall we continue hunting?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: By all means, Lady warrior, by all means. I’m just trying to loosen up and enjoy myself on the quest. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 45 46 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 66.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: For me half the quest is enjoying the ride. Letting the cards fall where they may. Just taping into the experience.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: I’m sorry, but my quest affords me no such luxury.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Come on. As if MY quest is any less important. There’s big shit going on in our quest that you wouldn’t believe. HUGE-- Something SQUISHES under Thadeous foot. He lifts his foot to reveal a The graphic smashed remains of DEAD FAIRY.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh, dead fairy, gross. He quickly rubs his foot on the ground like he’s getting dog shit off.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Did you just step on a fairy? Thadeous nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The camp fire dies down as the remains of a boar are still burning. Thadeous is fast asleep. Isabel sits watch at the perimeter. Fabious looks to the moons up above. Closer than they’ve ever been. Courtney stirs.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Courtney, may I ask you a question?

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Of course.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: You don’t think it weird of me that I never slept with Belladonna do you? That we were waiting until marriage to consecrate the most sacred of actions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 67.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: No. I mean, yes. I have courted ladies I never got to fuck.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Oh-

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: I worked as a Squire for the Emperor Chief of Xaxxon. A savage tribe in the heart of the jungles. His daughter had the most beautiful afro and a skin with the sweet glaze of honey. At night, she would sneak down to the boweries, knock on my window and we would whisper for hours of a life where love was simple and our feelings were true.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: And were you afraid to go all the way... Or just-?

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Previous to my engagements, she had relations with a certain Marquis who was known throughout the land for his genital fungus, twisted sex games and a legendary fire breathing cock. Also, I had heard she had a vagina with teeth. Some pockets of life I’ve pledged best remain as mysteries. Taken aback by this passionate but brief confession.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: So... It was more out of precaution and sanitation than any true moral character on your behalf?

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Yeah, I just really didn’t want my prick to fall off. Thadeous snores loudly. They both turn to look at him.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Look at him sleeping like an angel. Ah, I have spent a lifetime often envious of my brother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 68.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Envious of Thadeous?

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: That’s right. All the times when he can sit back and have a laugh and pour another drink. I am the one on stage, wearing make-up to cover my acne. My hair quaffed just so. Always the pressure to be the perfect son.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: I’m sure that Thadeous would see things differently.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: I’m sure he does. I suppose the grass is always greener.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: That it is, Sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Isabel leads the gang down a well traveled road. Thadeous and Fabious watch Isabel and speak discreetly.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: So tell me, brother. How did you fare with your conquests last eve on your... hunt?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Satisfaction with a capital “S”.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: You performed SEX with her?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Pleasure burst and boom called upon me no less than five times. As for the lady... she fared even better.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Good on you, brother. A warrior’s thirst can not be quenched by the battlefield alone. Where does that leave you two this morning?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 47 48 "Your Highness” - Draft 15th April 2009 69.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: No strings. Almost as if nothing happened at all. Isabel turns around to them. Thadeous instantly goes quiet and awkward.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Gentlemen, for better or worse, we have arrived in Muldiss Darton.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MULDISS DARTON is somewhere between Mos Eisley and Branson, Missouri. A busy MEDIEVAL MARKET VILLAGE. The center of the town is a long street surrounded by shop fronts, pubs, and inns. In the streets, horses are tied to posts and random shit is burning in the background.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Long have I wanted to lay my eyes upon these streets of lore... As they walk through the streets, they see: Three BARBARIANS proudly showing off a DEAD DRAGON.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: M’lady, if this is to be where we part ways then I wish you the blessings of the Eternal Eld. Respectfully he bows. Isabel embraces him.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: May good fortune return you and your friends home safely.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Isabel, I bid you farewell. I wish you great success on your journey. Fabious takes a knee, kisses her hand and then leaves. Isabel turns back to find Thadeous standing there.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: So... I guess this is it. Guess we're really at the end. Thadeous chuckles to himself nostalgically.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Seems but a moment’s time since we were thrust together in combat. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 70.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: But alas, tis the nature of the quest. He looks back to her saying so much with his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Be careful on your journey. Please stay close to your brother.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I will protect him. Is there anything we need to talk about... I mean... where does this leave “us”? Should we get a drink and explore our desires?

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: I have no time for relationships, Thadeous, were I even interested. The balance of life in this land depends on my dedication to my quest. You see I-

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Got it. You’re busy. Me too. I have more than enough stuff to be thinking about on our quest too. I'll be fine.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Goodbye, Thadeous. Isabel holds out her hand for a shake but Thadeous has already committed to the hug and open mouth kiss which is really awkward.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Don’t weep. We will embrace again if the stars align. I believe it to be so.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: I’m pretty sure that’s not going to happen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Courtney, Fabious, and Thadeous look at a small stable filled with HORSES and HAY.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Tell me you're joking?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 49 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 71.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: No, brother, this is where we shall sleep tonight. Just then a LARGE HORSE stands right in front of Thadeous, its tail whisking in his face. Thadeous shoves its rear as hard as he can... The horse doesn’t budge.

dialogues.speaker: MOVE YOU BEAST
dialogues.text: (to the others) Where are we to sleep? Tucked away beneath the shadows of this creature’s sagging bean sacks? Thadeous punches the HORSE in the ass as hard as he can. The Horse remains unmoved. THADEOUS (CONT’D) We’re Princes, I’m sick of sleeping like dogs. I demand we stay in proper accommodations! Fabious scans the area outside of the stable. Looking at each MAN that passes.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: We must keep a low profile. Assassins could be chasing a high bounty on our heads as we speak. The eclipse draws near and we can leave nothing to chance.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Listen, dear Fabious. We've been doing this quest YOUR way from the start and where has it gotten us?

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: It has gotten us HERE, a half day’s journey from where my love is imprisoned. Thadeous, I am trying to maintain a positive attitude, but honestly, your grievances are beginning to wear on me. Let us rest. At dawn we will face the Enchanted Cavern retrieve the blade of the unicorn and then storm Leezar’s lair. We have quite a day ahead.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Which is why I desire a mead! One beer. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 49 50 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 72.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: If the service is quick, possibly two, but absolutely no more than three. INT. THE HORSE’S PISS - NIGHT 50 Thad, Fab, and Courtney sit at the bar of a dark and seedy pub. They’re wearing HOODS AND CLOAKS, keeping their faces hidden from sight. They look around the bar at the SHADY DARK HEROES that mill about. THE MOODY THIEF who rolls dice at a table all by himself. ZULU WARRIORS, ELVES, BARBARIANS, VIKINGS, IDENTICAL TWIN CLERICS. Every sort of hero from every tale...

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Many heroes pass through this town. Many egos. For half of them it’s the night before the big match, for the other half it’s the night after... Some are victorious... IN THE FAR CORNER, SIX TINY MEN are toasting excitedly, THE TINIEST ONE waves a JEWELED DAGGER above his head in victory.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: +.-Others are crushed with failure and defeat,. prone to inexplicable violence. ACROSS THE BAR, a DRUNK BARBARIAN smashes his Battle Axe through a table, then in a blind crying rage, he puts his fists through the walls of the tavern. He drops to his knees and screams to the HEAVENS.

dialogues.speaker: BARBARIAN
dialogues.text: Damn you GODS! DAMN YOU!!!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Nebbishes, all of them. Especially him.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Pray that you never know the taste of defeat like that. I’ve been fortunate, dear brother. (getting emotional) I‘ve never failed a quest. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 73.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: But I will open up to you now, and tell you something I have told no man. In my heart lies a fear, that one day I will encounter another who is stronger, faster, more cunning, and I do not know if I’m strong enough to-

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Oh shit! Shut up!

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: (alarmed) What?!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: She's here. They turn around and in walks ISABEL...with SIX BLONDE SHIRTLESS MEN, oils glistening off their ripped muscles and handsome faces.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Look at those men. Those beautiful men with their sexual ways. IN A DARK CORNER ACROSS THE BAR, Isabel and the MEN take their seats. .

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I’m going to say something.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: You would risk exposing us? Putting at risk our chances to-? Thadeous’ gaze shifts from Isabel to the RIPPED FIGHTERS.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I’m filled with jealous rage right now and can not be held responsible for my actions. Thadeous gets up and make a beeline for Isabel.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: No, Thadeous, wait-!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Lady warrior, fancy seeing you here.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Thadeous?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 74.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Isabel rolls up a MAP. He plants a kiss on her hand.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: We were just out for a swill before our journey tomorrow, when Courtney brought to my attention that you may be in some sort of a rape predicament with these androgynous rat catchers.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Thadeous, this is Adam Chatsworth, and these are his men.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Hello Adam, is that woman's hair you wear?

dialogues.speaker: ADAM
dialogues.text: Aye, and who might this be Isabel? Answer quick lest I cut his throat.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: This is Prince Thadeous of Dubris.

dialogues.speaker: ADAM
dialogues.text: Dubris? Isn’t that where they make all the cheese? Adam and his men laugh.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: No, mother fucker, we have nothing to do with cheeses!

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Thadeous, that’s enough.

dialogues.speaker: ADAM
dialogues.text: I take no offense, Isabel. What he says is true. I have indeed fucked his mother. Fabious still cloaked steps in.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Perhaps you should watch your tongue when speaking of my family, good sir. Our mother is dead!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 75.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: (ignoring him) Isabel may I speak to you outside for a moment?

dialogues.speaker: ADAM
dialogues.text: Piss off!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Put a fucking shirt on!

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: These men have the map I need to complete my quest.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Well I may not be able to provide you with that small offering but I can give you this... He pulls out another folded up piece of parchment.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: A song, that I wrote... From my heart.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: A song?

dialogues.speaker: ADAM
dialogues.text: Oh delight! Please entertain us with one of your songs. Adam and his men laugh.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I wrote it after you left and my heart had a hole in it. T’is called: NIGHT WARRIORS. My minstrel Courtney will perform it. He is a trained artiste. Thadeous hands Courtney the lyrics. The Bartender hands him a lyre. Thadeous locks eyes, with Isabel.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Every word, Courtney. Courtney hesitantly strums. The bar goes silent and all eyes turn to our heroes. Thad looks to Isabel and nods.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: (singing) LADY WARRIOR. I WILL COME FOR YOU. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 50 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 76.

dialogues.speaker: WILL COME FOR YOU, COME-COME-COME-
dialogues.text: Thadeous mouths the lyrics to himself and then joins him in duet. Isabel smiles... charmed and looks to Thad.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY/THADEOUS
dialogues.text: (singing)

dialogues.speaker: ARE ONE. I WILL COME. COME ON YOU
dialogues.text: An ELF throws a BOTTLE that smashes near Courtney.

dialogues.speaker: BARBARIAN QUEEN
dialogues.text: My night warrior was killed in battle! This song woes my heart!

dialogues.speaker: ADAM
dialogues.text: Thou dost infect mine ears!

dialogues.speaker: ELF
dialogues.text: I hate that fucking song! Thadeous returns by throwing a bottle and nailing the Elf square in the head. The enraged Elf runs to Thadeous with FISTS swinging! Thadeous punches him in the face and he goes down.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: What did I tell you Thadeous?! Your actions are about to ruin everything!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: No. See?! I knocked out an elf! Suddenly FIVE ENRAGED LITTLE PEOPLE emerge from a trap door in the floor launching a chain reaction of CHAOS. The entire bar BEGINS FIGHTING. An old school BAR ROOM

dialogues.speaker: BRAWL
dialogues.text: ~- THADEOUS ducks as a chair goes flying past, smashing into Adam and his men! He takes a shot. ~- ISABEL throws a Viking down the bar after he gives her an inappropriate snarl of desire. She then chugs an alcoholic concoction that has a HUMAN TOE in it and then smashes the glass bottle on the dizzy Viking’s head. - FABIOUS jumps, DOUBLE KICKING the identical Twin Clerics into a barrel. He then punches his fist into one of their DICKS, they BOTH go down screaming!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 50 51 “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 77.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: - ADAM AND HIS move as one oily/sexy unit, taking turns punching a GANG OF ELVES and doing some tag team PRO WRESTLING MOVES. =! RINEY crawls under the tables dodging broken goblets, stools, blades, and Thadeous who crashes in front of him! THE BARTENDER, SCREAMS like a siren... Everyone stops and holds their ears.

dialogues.speaker: BARTENDER
dialogues.text: PARTY’S OVER! EVERY ONE OUT!!!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Did you not like my poem? Adam swings one last punch, knocking Thadeous down. He collapses on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: ADAM
dialogues.text: Be gone you lonesome devils! A goodly apple rotten at the heart! Fuck you and your poetry! EXT. HORSE’S PISS SALOON - NIGHT 51 THADEOUS, FABIOUS, COURTNEY and ISABEL are thrown out.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: This is a mistake! I am not travelling with these fools! The door is slammed in her face. She turns to Thadeous.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: How dare you disrupt my bargaining! If I fail the quest before me, I will hold you responsible! - I bid you farewall once and for all! This comment turns Thadeous’ stomach. He is wasted and beaten. She storms off. Thadeous turns to his brother.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Those are simply emotional walls she has built to ease the pain of our departure. Come, let us find The Blade of Unicorns. Let us rescue Belladonna! He stumbles, dizzy, drunk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 51 52 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 78.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: On second thought... Maybe we should get a good night’s sleep first. He blacks out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Belladonna is fast asleep in her chamber. Then from the shadows...

dialogues.speaker: . VOICE
dialogues.text: Awake, my sweet. Belladonna slowly wakes, her eyes adjusting to see...

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA
dialogues.text: Fabious? - You came! Fabious steps out of the shadows wearing a FLASHY OUTFIT. He takes his shirt off and crawls to the foot of the bed. Belladonna looks around the room confused.

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Here, my love? Now? I thought we were to save me for marriage.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Suck upon my bruce and lick my beans. Take them in your mouth and hum.

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA
dialogues.text: There is something afoul here. You look like my love, but-- She pulls free of his embrace. BELLADONNA (CONT’D) What witch craft is this?! Who is this imposter? Fabious rolls his eyes and then turns into... Leezar.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Ta-dal A little game I like to play.

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA
dialogues.text: Keep your tricks to yourself.

dialogues.speaker: CCONTTNUED V
dialogues.text: 52 53 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 79.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: That’s so YOU, Belladonna. And I, transmogrifying my self into your ex-love is so ME. I will win your heart. And the beast you birth will be so destructive that it’s very presence in this world will shift all the power to he who controls the creature. Me. After tomorrow I will be able to give you anything you desire. Leezar looks at her, long and hard as he seethes. He moves to the window and looks out to the MOONS.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What is it that he has that I don’t? Tell me. Be honest. Is it my mothers? Because if it is my mothers, you know that I would chose you over them. To be honest, I will feed them to the dragon upon its birth. How about that?

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA
dialogues.text: What will it take for you to realize that you will never have my love? Never. Do you hear me!? My heart belongs to Fabious! Leezar takes it in. Then looks to the moons.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Be that as it may.... Your body will belong to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fabious screams in his sleep.

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA
dialogues.text: Thadeous and Courtney are ripped from their dreams.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Fabious, wake up! What’s wrong? Fabious stirs... He sees some SHEEP and a COW.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: We must move. Belladonna doesn’t have much longer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 53 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 80.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: You're telling me. The guys turn disturbed and curious. They see JULIE STEP OUT from around a corner smiling. Boremont steps behind him and carries a sword.

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: How delighted we were to hear word of a rumble at the saloon. We assumed t’was you Princesses who started the melee. Julie steps to Fabious. Courtney steps to block him.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Step aside Courtney and join us. My blade yearns to sink into this fucker’s flesh! Julie lunges at Thadeous when Fabious makes a move. He disarms Julie with a kick and then throws him down onto a SLAUGHTERHOUSE CHOPPING BLOCK. A HEAVY BLADE above his head held by a rope.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Drop your weapon Boremont, or Julie, my FORMER friend will die. Julie’s face is washed with fear as Fabious pins him.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Perhaps my father’s army will be more entertaining than we. After Simon’s message, they should be arriving nigh on now.

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: Oh, yes, about that. While I have no doubt that the good king Tallious would send out every last man at the slightest hint of jeopardy befalling his two sons... There is one problem in the communication you extended. Boremont throws down Simon, who is SMASHED TO SHIT and makes weak beeps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 81.

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: Now let Julie go and submit yourself to me.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Let my brother and Courtney go, you may do with ME as you will-

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: He’s bluffing!

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: This blade is trained for your head, Julie. If you’d like to keep it, I can assure you, that you are only taking one Prince today. Julie remains still. He looks to Boremont. FABIOUS (CONT’D) Think, Boremont. What use is the second born Prince of Dubris? Never has there been such an heir so unfit to wear the crown. Of what use would Leezar have of HIM? Thadeous winces.

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: He could mount his head upon his wall.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: A trophy of what?! If ever there was a head to be mounted, surely it should be mine. I’m Fabious, slayer of the Gandar Beast, Liberator of Dawnscreed, First born son of the Great King Tallious! Or you could take your master the fat face of Thadeous, terrible song writer, self centered, egotistical, asshole. Thadeous looks to his brother, hurt.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And would not a far more devastating blow be to leave the possibility that one day this buffoon might actually become King of Dubris?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 53 54 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 82.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Boremont considers... then releases Thad and Courtney from his aim and gives them a shove as they pass. Courtney gathers Simon’s broken pieces. Fabious lets Julie loose and puts his hands on his head. Thadeous calls to him from the door.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Is that what you truly think of me, Brother?

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Go, Thadeous! Go in any direction you wish. LEAVE NOW! Thadeous pouts away with Courtney. He looks back... Boremont kicks Fabious, dropping him to his knees in front of Julie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thadeous and Courtney run like the wind. Thadeous stops, turns to Courtney, drops to his knees.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Oh gods, Courtney, what has befallen us? What do we do? Thadeous drops to his knees and screams to the heavens. THADEOUS (CONT’D)

dialogues.speaker: DAMN YOU GODS
dialogues.text: Thadeous jumps up. THADEOUS (CONT’D) I’1l tell you what we do, we steal a steed, and ride-- Courtney waits for his direction, ready to save Fabious. THADEOUS (CONT’D) --To the next town! Become ghosts, start a new life, one where you still serve me and we become stable boys, and live off the land and bed the fickle wives of farmers... What in the hell is that?! Thadeous points to the opening of a crooked cave. (CONTTNUED 1)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 83.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Could that be the Enchanted Cave, sir? The one Fabious was looking for? The one that contains The Blade of Unicorns?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Or maybe it’s some other cave. Both their eyes find the aged wooden sign that reads, ENCHANTED CAVE.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Well...

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Let us forget we ever saw this place.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: What about the sword? What about Prince Fabious?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Don’t ever say his name in my presence again. You heard what he said about me!

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Have you ever known your brother to be as negative and insulting as he was moments ago?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Of course not. But he’s changed. I swear to you. Never have I heard such vulgarities!

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: I’ve also heard other things Your Highness that you might not be privy to. I’ve heard how he wished he could be more like you. How he admired and respected you. How he would defend your name in conflict with others.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: (Getting angrier) There was no such insight said by stupid Fabious who is always

dialogues.speaker: HANDSOMER
dialogues.text: (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 84.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: FABIOUS who everyone LOVES, and always looks out for me, and has always been there... when I’ve needed him, and... Oh gods, Courtney, you’re right. Oh gods!

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: You must turn away. I’m having an embarrassing... epiphany. Courtney turns away. With utter dread, Thadeous realizes- THADEOUS (CONT’D)

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: Save your brother, Sir?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Shut up! Thadeous stomps around in a circle, torn/frustrated. He then stops and looks to the opening of the Enchanted Cave. A low howl blows from it’s depths. THADEOUS (CONT’D) Fine!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thadeous walks into the dark cavern. Fog and large spider webs fill the interior. Courtney stays behind at the entrance holding the broken remains of Simon.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: And is the sword just suppose to be sitting in here somewhere?

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: I’m not sure.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Well, we’ll find out won’t we. Just then the fog begins to grow thicker. THADEOUS (CONT’D) Courtney? Into the cavern full of jagged rocks. Within the hollow chamber, he hears a faint echoes of familiar voices: (CONTTNIED )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 55 “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 85.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS, (0.C.)
dialogues.text: You smell of wizard’s weed and bloodberry rum... Alarmed at the presence, he stands ram-rod straight.

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS, (0.C.)
dialogues.text: You will respect me if not as your Father, then as your KING! He searches frantically through the cavernous space when-

dialogues.speaker: VOICE, (0.C.)
dialogues.text: What are you doing? Thadeous turns to find a 10 YEAR OLD BOY - that looks like it could be a younger version of himself and dressed EXACTLY LIKE HIM. Unimpressed, Thadeous motions towards the boy.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Away with you, child. This is no place for androgenous sprites such as yourself. (pulls up his pants) This is a journeyman’s cavern. For men like me. Prince Thadeous! - BE

dialogues.speaker: GONE
dialogues.text: The child stands bold - unflinching.

dialogues.speaker: YOUNG CHILD
dialogues.text: But I am Thadeous! Insulted by the statement, Thadeous storms up to the child.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: How dare you... His hand rearing back to strike the boy, when--

dialogues.speaker: ANOTHER VOICE, (0.C.)
dialogues.text: I am Thadeous! Stunned, Thadeous spins to discover several OTHERS dressed exactly like him - All spitting images of Thadeous, yet pathetic and strange in appearance.

dialogues.speaker: OBESE THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I am Thadeous! (CONTTNUED )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 86.

dialogues.speaker: FEMALE THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I am Thadeous!

dialogues.speaker: ASIAN THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I am Tha-dreous!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Shut up! All the versions of Thadeous laugh at him.

dialogues.speaker: VERSIONS OF THADEOUS
dialogues.text: (mocking) Shut up! Thadeous pushes past them, searching for the sword. The strange visitors mocking him and laughing as he searches. And yet, another voice assaults him:

dialogues.speaker: FEMALE VOICE
dialogues.text: Thadeous. It is your mother... Culling a gentleness we have yet to see, Thadeous is lead through the rocks by the voice to stare at an ANCIENT ALTAR. Etched in gold and decorated with gems, a giant MIRROR stands before him - The face of a BEAUTIFUL WOMAN speaking from within its reflection. Thadeous is petrified with emotion.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Mother? What great sorcery brings us together? Can this be..?

dialogues.speaker: BEAUTIFUL WOMAN
dialogues.text: Indeed, fair prince. Long have I wished to speak with you, to warn you of your current quest. - Danger awaits at every step. Death close with every breath. - Turn back before it is too late.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: But the quest for the blade, my brother, his love... the kingdom.

dialogues.speaker: BEAUTIFUL WOMAN
dialogues.text: The kingdom indeed. Consider that if your brother never returns from this journey, you yourself will be crowned king. An empire to lord for yourself. King Thadeous. Thadeous’ considers this royal offering, then his face sours in discontent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 55 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 87.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: He approaches the mirror, trembling with spite at the mention of his brother’s death. Seeming to stew in his own mind.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: You’re not my mother. He suddenly THROWS A PUNCH! Flinching at the show of force, the Beautiful maiden’s face contorts for impact, instinctively MORPHING back into it’s true form - The face of a LEEZAR MOTHER #1. The gig is up. THADEOUS (CONT’D) You devil wench! (points to himself) You attempt to fool ME? The master of illusion and entertainments!? Leezar’s Mother lashes out at Thadeous.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: As a fool, you shall fail harder than even the lowest of your expectations!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I will not fail.

dialogues.speaker: REFLECTION OF THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Yes you will.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Huh-uh! Enraged, Thadeous leans back. Now, with all his might, he PUNCHES THROUGH THE MIRROR... shattering his own reflection. Just then the whole cave begins to rumble. Thadeous covers his ears as knife-like shards of the mirror fall around him. Thadeous looks up stunned. As the smoke and debris settles, there, where the mirror once stood, lies a DOORWAY - Beyond it, a shaft of light streams from within. Collecting himself, he walks through... The gnarled rocks of the cave seem to fall away from this enclave, as the light adorns TREASURES and GOLD from ancient civilizations past. Thadeous is overwhelmed. Walking through the piled wealth, Thadeous’ eyes are suddenly drawn to the wall - The SKULL OF A UNICORN gazes into the beyond, mounted on the top of a sarcophagus. (CONTTNUED )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 55 56 57 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 88.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Standing before the mystical steed’s skull, Thadeous inhales a giant breath and he grips the Unicorn’s horn. THADEOUS (CONT’D) (to himself) Destined to fail, so they say...? Thadeous unsheathes the spike from the bone, revealing a cold steel blade - THE BLADE OF THE UNICORN. Thundering drums and music begin to build as Thadeous raises the cutlass into the shaft of light. Drawing into the blade, the sword splits the beam like a prism, showering the room in the warm hues of a RAINBOW.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I ask those who are doubtful to look upon me now! To gaze upon Lord Thadeous and dare speak their ghastly ills! Only a champion would hold the Blade of Unicorn in his hands! - And I, the real Thadeous, is that man!!! Music floods the cavern along with the rainbow light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Courtney fixes Simon like a jigsaw puzzle. Simon BLEEPS happily and begins flapping it’s clunky wounded wings. Wavering in the air ERRATICALLY LIKE he’s shit-housed. +.-out of the cave storms Thadeous. He raises the Sword of the Unicorn above his head. The afternoon sun catching the powerful blade just right.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Let’s quest motherfucker. Courtney applauds him proudly. INT. LEEZAR‘S DUNGEON - NIGHT 57 In this TORTURE CHAMBER of sorts, Fabious is chained to the wall with his shirt off and his arms outstretched, Julie whips him and snickers. A GUARD inspects hot coals.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: It’s not death you face, just a great deal of discomfort as you watch your enemy make sex with your love. (CONTTNUED )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 89.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Leezar has seized hold of your mind.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: For generations YOUR family has treated MY family like employees.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: But... you WERE employees!

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: I know! But those days are over! Leezar promised to make me a 60/40 partner in his evil empire if I could “unhinge” the great Tallious and the beloved perception of Dubris. Julie whips Fabious again. LEEZAR ENTERS the chamber with his mothers and looks to Fabious, beaten and chained.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Leezar! Where is she?

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Where is who?

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: You know who! Leezar gets angry.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Belladonna belongs to me now. And tonight I am going to take her virginity under the moons and make her toes curl. Fabious tries with all his might to get free.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (to Julie) Beat him no more. I want him alive to see this ceremony of sorrows.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: And then what?

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: And then you die.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 57 58 59 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 90.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Indeed you are my son. Leezar, your eyes will glow and I will find my smile in the moment of your destiny. Leezar exits with a MARCH OF PRIDE. Julie turns to Fabious and giggles. The crescent moons shining through the window upon his broken face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a small wooden boat. Under the mind of new found confidence, Thadeous and Courtney row across a creepy bog. Simon chirps at the head of the boat leading them through the fog. The boat then bumps onto land. The fog clears revealing... LEEZAR'S LAIR a tall.and large castle made of BLACK ROCK, many towers and spires reach into the heavens. There is a gate made of SHRUBBERY surrounding a large WOODEN DOOR. Thadeous sizes up TWO GUARDS that stand at the gate and without hesitation, he takes The Blade of Unicorns and impales them. He kicks the door in. Thadeous, Courtney and Simon enter the door. CAMERA rises to reveal: A MASSIVE LABYRINTH that leads to LEEZAR’S DARK SPIRE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thadeous, Courtney and Simon round a corner, Thadeous in an adrenaline fueled hunt. They turn down another corridor with various path options... Becoming a bit disoriented. Simon CAWS. A_LOUD BEASTLY HUFF OF AIR echoes over them and lingers through the maze!!! From the FAR END of the PATH, they hear a loud GROWL. They turn to see a LARGE AND DAUNTING FIGURE. AN UNEARTHLY SHRIEK blasts at them. Out of the shadows charges A MINOTAUR: a man body, with the hideous head of a bull AND HIS DICK HANGING OUT! It RUNS AT THEM COUGHING...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 59 “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 91.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Thadeous has a moment of hesitation where he questions his strength and then bolts with Courtney! The Minotaur

dialogues.speaker: AFTER THEM
dialogues.text: They cut a left turn/round a right/another turn/moving quick! They JUMP over bones of previous victims. The minotaur stops to listen... hearing nothing but their own breath... Then Thadeous appears from around the corner in front of him. The minotaur takes off in the opposite direction. As best as his battered body can, Simon FLIES ABOVE THE WALLS, getting a clear vantage of the labyrinth below. Thadeous rounds a corner in his pursuit and sees THE MINOTAUR DRY HUMPIN COURTNEY... Eyes glaring and huffing. Courtney screams.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: OH GODS! The beast is upon us! Run Thadeous! Save yourself! The MINOTAUR COUGHS as he grooves. Thadeous can’t stop watching the beast’s animal thrusts. In a moment, Thadeous closes his eyes and concentrates. He summons the power of the Blade of the Unicorn and screams as he runs toward the beast. He raises the SWORD and slams it down INTO THE MINOTAUR’S BACK! The beast SCREAMS and drops DEAD before them. All falls quiet. It’s like the tape just melted in the middle of your favorite heavy metal jam.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Did you see that?! Did you see it?!

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: I saw it. You saved my life-! What are you doing? An excited Thadeous uses his sword to try to cut off one of the Minotaur’s horns.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Trying to take a souvenir of the kill. I wish to make a necklace, but this horn is proving to be a bit of a bitch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 59 60 61 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 92.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Courtney looks up to the TOWER OF DISORDER that stands in front of them: Part ruins, part tower, part observatory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Belladonna looks out the window crying... The moons rising. Her door opens and in walks Leezar’s MOTHERS.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Leezar would like you to put on one of these. He said you may choose. She looks at what they’ve brought in. The trashiest lingerie ever made.

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA
dialogues.text: Tell him, he will have to unwrap my flesh and bones to enter me. Belladonna tears up and looks out her window...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thadeous and Courtney enter the front gate into a foyer of stone ruins. Thadeous with sword in hand and the MINOTAUR’S DICK as a necklace. He shuts his eyes, and holds out his sword, as if it’s going to direct him. Nothing. THEN, from their left, they hear the loud STOMP OF MARCHING FOOT STEPS. They hide behind STATUES as TEN MASKED MINIONS MARCH BY. After they pass, ONE MINION TURNS AROUND... Thadeous and Courtney freeze as THEY ARE SPOTTED. Whispers turn to NOISE...then in a FLURRY OF BLADES, A MINION in the center turns and cuts the other MINIONS down. Thadeous and Courtney are stunned. The Minion looks up and then rips off its MASK. Stepping forward into the light, we see that it is ISABEL IN THE FLESH!

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Foolish prick, what are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I know you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 93.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: I hope this is not another one of your attempts to bed me. I’m at the end of my quest and need no anchor.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: You’re at the end of your quest? I’m at the end of my quest, to save my brother and his bride.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: You are after Leezar as well? Do you know he means to bring a dragon to this world tonight?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Duh. The hundred year eclipse thing.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: It is the duty of my family the Order of the Golden Knights to stop this prophecy from ever coming true. These witches found out my family was heritage of the order. They had my father and each of my brother’s killed. They wanted to make sure that nothing stood in their way tonight. They severely underestimated the surviving daughter.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Indeed. I say we rescue my brother, stop Leezar from the rape of Belladonna and avenge the death of your family. - And then you and I shall make love.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Let’s take things one quest at a time. Thadeous shrugs

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Isabel leads as everyone creeps along through CATACOMBS.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Get down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 62 63 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 94.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: They crouch into the shadows, and see TWO GUARDS walk by on their patrol of the entrance to the DUNGEON. They pass unnoticed. Our heroes move past a SPIKED GATE into the DUNGEON. There they find Fabious, beaten and bruised. He rises upon seeing them and calls out:

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: What? What are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: We came to rescue you!

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: You did?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Yes! Are you surprised?

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Yes! INT. LEEZAR’S OBSERVATORY - CONTINUOUS 63 As the two moons rise out of the window, Leezar paces beside his altar. He looks nervous as if rehearsing for a speech, but he’s also practicing his sexual swerve, biting his lip and humping the air. Footsteps approach and his Mothers escort the lovely Belladonna to the altar wearing lingerie and chains. Leezar smiles.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: I’ve been waiting for this moment, since I was a boy. Belladonna kicks him hard in the nuts. He folds. LEEZAR (CONT’D) Tie her to the alter Mothers and let the canoodling and foreplay begin! Leezar has a seizure of energy. Balls of blue electricity billow in his hands. His power is growing. Thunder rolls.  64 “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 95. INT. LEEZAR’S ARMORY - MOMENTS LATER 64 A STOCK PILE OF ARMOR AND WEAPONS lay in the dungeon. The team GEARS UP: -FABIOUS finds his SWORD. -ISABEL straps a BOW on her back!

dialogues.speaker: -COURTNEY SWINGS A SLEDGE HAMMER
dialogues.text: -THADEOUS SWINGS The Blade of Unicorn, and still sucks! INTERCUT WITH... The gang walking down a long HALLWAY. Everyone looks up to A WINDING STAIRCASE leading to the observatory, and more importantly, to Belladonna. TEN Minions pour down to stop them. Fabious begins leading the raid up the stairs, his sword sparking in combat, deftly dispatching Minion after Minion as they rush down at him! Thadeous charges at a pair of fairly large Minions, sword spastically swinging, eyes completely closed. Isabel sees the Minions approaching blind Thadeous, and aims her BOW AND ARROWS! THWICK! THWICK! She shoots the minions. Thadeous opens an eye, his OPPONENTS are CRUMPLING TO THE FLOOR.

dialogues.speaker: TASTE DEATH YOU FOUL BEAST
dialogues.text: He shuts his eyes and swings his sword. THADEOUS (CONT’D)

dialogues.speaker: AND THAT
dialogues.text: THWICK! THWICK! THWICK! Again Thadeous’ foes fall easily at Isabel’s arrows, the Prince’s momentum sending him right past them, sword still swinging, eyes STILL SEALED TIGHT, unaware. He almost strikes Isabel.

dialogues.speaker: OPEN YOUR EYES
dialogues.text: THWICK! THWICK! Two more MINIONS drop.

dialogues.speaker: CCONTTNURD
dialogues.text: 64 65 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 96.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Isabel rolls her eyes, and then in a QUICK SPIN stashes her long bow and CHOPS the last minion’s head off.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: That was impressive, but you should have been there when I fought bravely through the Labyrinth.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: You entered through the Labyrinth?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: You should have just gone around through the back. It’s a much less hostile entrance.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Indeed. Why did you go through the Labyrinth? There’s a fucking Minotaur in there.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: I know. I killed him. Thadeous holds up the Minotaur dick that hangs from his neck. Fabious nods, impressed.

dialogues.speaker: THE CEREMONY OF THE TWIN MOONS
dialogues.text: Belladonna is tied to the altar, struggling. THE FOUR MOTHERS OF LEEZAR have formed a line at the steps below to bear witness. Julie steps out before them. Boremont stands guard.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Mothers of the Dark Realm. It has been my great fortune to have the honor of giving over my dedication and loyalty to the very dear Dark Lord Leezar. Leezar steps out before them and sets an HOUR GLASS. The sand slowly falls. He smiles proudly. (CONTTNITED )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 65 66 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 97.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Thank you Julie, Mothers... Tonight, I will usher in the dawning of a new age! Leezar leans over Belladonna. He smells her hair as we reveal THAT RASCAL SIMON watching. INT. LEEZAR’S TOWER/SPIRAL STAIRCASE - NIGHT 66 SIMON swoops down. Fabious offers his arm but the bird has a new friend and it lands on Thadeous’ shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Now my eyes hath witnessed it all.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Tis merely a truce after Courtney had him restored! Simon, what news dos’t thou bring? Simon BEEPS, Thadeous shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: I see. Formidable my tiny companion, formidable indeed.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: What’s he saying?!

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Tis far more treacherous than I thought. I can not ask you-

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Fabious you have never asked of me for a single thing. I will stand with you on this night.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: This coming from the same brother who wouldn't even be my best man?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Brother...I did not deserve to be your best man. The two fall into one hell of a handshake. Courtney's eyes brimming with tears. Isabel motions to the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: We can finish this whenever you maidens are ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 66 67 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 98.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Still holding each other, Thadeous and Fabious look each other dead in the eye...

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS/FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Ready! INT. LEEZAR’S OBSERVATORY - CONTINUOUS 67 The Mothers of the Dark Realm BEGIN CHANTING. Belladonna is strapped down, Leezar grins and rubs himself. Julie stands excited beside Boremont, holding a large TEACUP.

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: Please Julie calm down.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Sex. We’re about to watch some sex. Leezar pulls a lever, and the DOMED CEILING ABOVE THE ALTER OPENS like the iris of a camera, revealing the TWO MOONS, almost one. The sand in the hour glass continues...

dialogues.speaker: BRING FORTH THE POTION AT ONCE
dialogues.text: Julie dips a TEACUP into a cauldron of THICK YELLOW LIQUID and fills it to the rim. The Mothers continue to CHANT even LOUDER. Julie carries the teapcup to Leezar, and tips it so the potion pours down his throat. He slurps it like a baby.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Gods, it tastes terrible! What’s in this?

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Pixie’s tears, eye of black witch, scab of ogres three...

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: Ah yes! I thought I tasted scabs. So I really just drink this all at once, huh? Fabious, Thadeous, Isabel and Courtney appear along the back wall, in the shadows. Fabious spots BELLADONNA. -Leezar DRINKS THE LAST OF THE POTION! -The TWO MOONS ALIGN OVER HEAD! (CONT TNIUED 1)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 67 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 99.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: -Leezar BURPS as Belladonna SCREAMS FOR FABIOUS! -Boremont turns to see the VISITORS.

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: Intruders!!!

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Belladonna!!! Leezar turns in confusion. Fabious charges the room. Mothers and Boremont and Julie take guard.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: You're too late, the ceremony has begun. Belladonna is MINE now! Fools, GET THEM! Leezar shoots bolts of electricity at the heroes. They deflect them with their shields. Boremont steps forward twirling his sword.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Step aside, you traitor. THADEOUS STEPS UP NEXT TO HIS BROTHER and for the FIRST TIME IN THEIR LIVES, Fabious and Thadeous stand side by side, weapons ready and facing their enemies. THE SONS OF KING TALLIOUS ROAR and charge into battle! Courtney and Isabel joining in. Fabious vs. Boremont Thadeous vs. Julie Isabel and Courtney vs. The 4 Mothers. Belladonna struggles to break free from her straps. Leezar approaches her with sexual hunger. The ceiling of the chamber is open. The TWIN MOONS as ONE illuminating THE ALTAR. Leezar removes his cloak and seductively walks towards her wearing a robe. The light of the moons illuminating his pale frame. He holds his staff up and bolts of lightning shoot from the tip.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: It is all happening as planned. You, Me, the moons, your close friends being slaughtered below. (CONTTNUED )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 67 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 100.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Leezar mounts his staff into the floor, licks his lips and moves on top of her. Belladonna squirms beneath him. He kisses her, the tower rising even higher. SIMON FLIES UP, FLAPPING AND SQUAWKING. Leezar swats him.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Infernal beast! Mothers HELP! -In a swashbuckling swordfight, BOREMONT knocks the Sword from Fabious’ hand. Fabious kicks Boremont’s sword away and they fist fight!

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: Don’t you understand? I never wanted to hurt you. After all the adventures we'd been through together. I was merely in love! Boremont punches Fabious in the face.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: What? Fabious punches Boremont in the face. FABIOUS (CONT’D) I loved you too! As a brother!

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: Well I loved you like... like a man loves a man!

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Oh. Boremont kicks Fabious’ legs out from underneath him. Courtney joins THADEOUS to tag team Julie! -ISABEL fights the Mothers one at a time. They twirl STAFFS that shoot bolts of electricity, but Isabel is quick to defend herself with a sword and slays three of them.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHERS HOLD THEM BACK
dialogues.text: Julie stabs Courtney in the leg, then knocks Thadeous to the ground and wrestles him. Fabious and Boremont fight. Boremont knocks him to the ground and pins him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 67 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 101.

dialogues.speaker: BOREMONT
dialogues.text: You loved your brother more than me. And once you met Belladonna I knew I was moving even further down in your list of priorities. This was the only way! Boremont strangles Fabious. Fabious head butts him, breaking his grip, and with lightning fast speed he turns as Courtney throws him his sword. He grabs it with a smile and grips it with confidence as he lunges his blade into Boremont's GUT! Dropping him.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: This relationship has become very unhealthy. Fabious eyes Belladonna on the alter. Julie pins Thadeous and twists his nuts.

dialogues.speaker: JULIE
dialogues.text: Now that I am in a position of power, and you are not, tell me how it feels to be- From the side, Courtney SMASHES HIS SLEDGE HAMMER ON THE BACK OF JULIE’S HEAD. Thadeous grabs Julie and throws him in the boiling cauldron of yellow liquid. He screams as his body burns. Isabel confronts the last of the wicked mothers.

dialogues.speaker: MOTHER
dialogues.text: Your test is yet to come. Upon my death, I infest you with curses. The Mother raises her hand and sends a burning glow to Isabel’s weapons. She drops them. Isabel quickly pulls a dagger from her boot and whips it at the witch’s face. It sticks in her eye.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Next time you want to smash a blood line of Knights. Make sure you kill every one AND THEIR

dialogues.speaker: DAUGHTERS
dialogues.text: The Mother falls to her knees screaming. Isabel walks behind her and breaks the old woman’s neck. As the chaos dies down and Leezar mounts Belladonna, Fabious runs to Thadeous--—

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 67 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 102.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Your blade, Thadeous, it will only work for you since you retrieved it! You must come with me to battle Leezar. Thadeous looks to his brother. He takes a deep breath and then they march together toward the alter and BELLADONNA. The HOUR GLASS runs out. The MOONS are at their peak now. ONE GLOWING MASS. Leezar looks at Belladonna. His eyes begin to GLOW.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: I will teach you to love me! He raises his hand rip her blouse open when-- A HAND grabs his neck. Leezar turns around to find: FABIOUS, who swings his sword and drives it into Leezar’s heart. He GASPS! Fabious pulls the blade out and in one swift slash cuts the binds that hold Belladonna to the altar. Leezar starts laughing as his wound instantly heals. LEEZAR (CONT’D) You fool...don’t you remember. I can't be killed by an ordinary blade. There is only one way-! Leezar turns to see Thadeous terrible, but dramatically swinging the Blade of the Unicorn... wind blows through his hair.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR, (CONT'D)
