dialogues.text: Oh, fuck. This is Thadeous’ moment. He charges Leezar. Leezar sends out bolts of magic but Thadeous who has still learned nothing is blindly swing his sword and deflecting each bolt. And then--THWIP! Thadeous drives the sword deep into Leezar’s heart. This time he bleeds. This time it does not heal. Leezar’s face looks up to the two MOONS PASSING... the union broken. He looks back to Fabious... Belladonna by his side. (CONTTNUED )

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 67 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 103.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Just a quick fuck! Will you not even grant me that!? Blood everywhere. Thadeous pulls his blade out. Leezar drops to his knees. Belladonna steps up to him. He smiles a bloody grin. She leans in close, and then PUSHES LEEZAR OVER knocking him off the alter. Leezar stumbles to the chamber floor below. Isabel, and Courtney approach... Just as collapses next to them. Isabel looks up. Thadeous looks up. Fabious, and Belladonna stand together under the light of the Two Moons above that are moving beyond each other. Belladonna and Fabious make out. Thadeous looks to Isabel who sharpens her blade. Thadeous looks away. Isabel watches him out of the corner of her eye. Fabious takes a moment...

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: At this moment, on this day, the first day of the Crescent Twins calendar, I Prince Fabious of Dubris announce the quest to save Belladonna and rid the world of Leezar once and for all to be--

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: What’s happening to me? Something’s wrong... Everyone turns to see: LEEZAR, his broken body alive.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What have you done?! The moons have passed...this seed should not still be in me... Leezar manages to stand, his whole body looking bloated as it now undulates like a walking water bed. LEEZAR (CONT’D) Please... I need helogGULFFG! Leezar VOMITS and at the same time his doughy body inflates around the middle and he involuntarily convulses into a SQUAT. His face goes RED as he grits his teeth and pulls down his pants.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 67 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 104.

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: What’s wrong with him! Leezar SCREAMS, And right then: A HUGE WET EGG FALLS OUT FROM BETWEEN HIS LEGS, sloshing the floor with a THUMP!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Did he just lay a fucking egg?

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR
dialogues.text: (drooling) Mistakes were made... Leezar stumbles along slowly. Just then, THE EGG begins to shake, a hairline crack zigzagging across it. The egg splits open, and out pops: A_SLIPPERY DEFORMED DRAGON FETUS, the half formed DARK SEED. It’s the size of a large dog, and is all fucked up, not being properly harvested, and is literally one of the grossest things ever seen, but somehow kind of cute. It SCREECHES and FLOPS AROUND, its malformed wings flapping.

dialogues.speaker: LEEZAR, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hell is empty and the devils are all here!!! Leezar stumbles in front of the beast. It SHRIEKS AND climbs up Leezar’s body. It sticks its toothy asshole over Leezar’s head and engulfs it. His face can be seen screaming through its dripping translucent skin. Leezar’s head explodes inside the fetus. The dragon then turns toward our heroes, opens its jaws and--THWICK! The SPIKE Isabel tore from Clawdaddy rips through the creature’s wings. Pinning it to the floor SHRIEKING. Thadeous approaches the trapped Creature.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: If there’s one lesson to be learned in this tale it’s to never judge a book by its cover. Sure the second born Prince may seem like a good for nothing, but when put to the test, he pulls through just fine. What if the same be true for this poor creature? Thadeous leans in close to the CREATURE. THADEOUS (CONT’D) Shall we learn nothing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 67 68 “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 105.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: The CREATURE SCREAMS and spits BLOOD all over Thadeous’ face. He nods, turns, and then attempting to be super bad ass, thrusts his sword behind him...STABBING THE CREATURE IN_THE GUT! Hacking madly at the screaming abomination. He looks to his companions proudly. They shake their heads “no”. Thadeous closes his eyes and THRUSTS his fist into the beast again and removes its heart. He forces a smile and takes a bloody bite.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fivesome walk out of the Valley into the morning light. Courtney’s leg is bandaged.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Courtney I want you to forget none of this. I expect you to have this tale memorized and perhaps choreographed to present to the kingdom upon our return.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: See, questing is not all bad.

dialogues.speaker: BELLADONNA
dialogues.text: It led you to me. She kisses Fabious. Thadeous turns to Isabel.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: You've battled with honor. Why don’t you treat yourself and take rest back at our castle. We have pickles, slaves, and all the herbs you care to smoke.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: I never. rest. There is another mission that calls me to the Western Marshes. She smiles, leans in and kisses him. His eyes light up.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I won't forget you, prince. He takes the Minotaur dick and tries to put it around her neck. She stops him.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: .+.To remember me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 68 69 70 71 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 106.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: I‘1l remember you in other ways. I really don’t want that thing touching me. Isabel hands it back, then turns her horse in the opposite. direction. ISABEL (CONT’D) Until we meet again. Thadeous waves to her as she gallops away. He tries to be strong, wiping a tear from his eye.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Is thou alright, brother? Thadeous fights his tears back. Gets a hold of himself. The Four ride off into the sunset together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tallious sits in his chamber, writing a novel. Just then A ROYAL GUARD bursts into the hall.

dialogues.speaker: GUARD
dialogues.text: Sir, there’s something you should see!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A ROYAL GUARD looks to the horizon at the FOUR RIDERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thadeous, Fabious, Belladonna, and Courtney arrive in front of the gates. The gates open revealing... THE ENTIRE KINGDOM assembled, Tallious, front and center. Fabious raises his SWORD above his head. The KINGDOM erupts into CHEERS.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Are they clapping for all of us?

dialogues.speaker: COURTNEY
dialogues.text: I believe so.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Even me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 71 72 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 107.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Especially you, brother. Thadeous takes pause letting it soak in. He raises the Blade of Unicorn above his head and the crowd goes WILD. He turns to Fabious and smiles. Courtney smiles too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The COURTYARD is decked out once again for a royal wedding. The reception is underway. Fabious and Belladonna dance in front of the crowd and kiss, husband and wife. She dances worse than your average white girl. Courtney, Tumblebottom and the elves spin a choreographed Mime Routine of the Adventure. Thadeous watches proudly next to his father King Tallious.

dialogues.speaker: TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: You have done well, son. You saved the entire kingdom. Not a bad run for your first quest

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Well, I'd be remiss if I said I did it alone. Fabious did contribute what he could. Tallious points to Belladonna and Fabious kissing.

dialogues.speaker: TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: Do you think they’1l1 last?

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Barring that another demented wizard doesn’t kidnap her and then have his head bitten off by a dragon's asshole... I'd say yes. Tallious puts his arm on Thadeous’ shoulder. Thadeous smiles. Finally respect. The moment is well earned. Feeling good. King still has his hand on shoulder. Thadeous still just stands there. No one says anything. Great moment gets a little awkward as we stay just a little too long, until--

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I'm going to get another drink. You need anything?

dialogues.speaker: KING TALLIOUS
dialogues.text: No, I’m good.  73 “Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 108. INT. THADEOUS’ BEDROOM - NIGHT 73 Thadeous lays in bed all alone...it’s dark.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Ah, lady warrior. His eyes are squinted shut. THADEOUS (CONT’D) You came back. And now you want me to pleasure you.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Oh... excuse me, brother. Thadeous jumps up startled, stuffing his bruce and beans under a fancy pillow. FABIOUS (CONT’D) Don’t mean to interrupt. I just came by to tell you that... Tonight seeing you at the wedding it didn’t seem right that you were all alone. So I’ve brought someone here for you. Someone I know you’ve been missing very much. And someone that I know has been missing you. Thadeous sits up excited.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Isabel? Fabious smiles and presents... STEVEN, the fat lizard animal companion that Thadeous and YOU have long since forgotten.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: I’ve brought you Steven!

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Steven? Fabious puts Steven on Thadeous’ lap. He’s obviously disappointed, but instead of throwing a tantrum, he merely smiles and looks up to Fabious.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Thank you, Fabious. Simon squawks in the corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 73 "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 109.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Still doesn’t mean you are allowed in my bedroom, Simon.

dialogues.speaker: FABIOUS
dialogues.text: Good night, Thadeous. Fabious exits, leaving Thadeous and Steven all alone.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Well, Steven, real handy you ended up being. Go sit in the corner while I finish strumming my filthies. Thadeous dumps Steven on the ground. He looks up, and there standing in the flesh is ISABEL. THADEOUS (CONT’D) Oh Jesus!

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: I was able to wrap things up in the West quicker than expected. And I have not been able to stop thinking of you.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Oh weird. I was just about to finish thinking of you. The two begin kissing passionately.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Wait, before we go any further there is something I need to tell you...

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: And what might that be? She rips open her dress to reveal a STEEL CHASTITY BELT.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: It’s a chastity belt. Put upon me by an evil witch a long time ago.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: What a horribly cruel thing to do!

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: She now roams the snow mountains of the Shahmir. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Your Highness" - Draft 15th April 2009 110.

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: If I can defeat her, the curse will be broken and the belt will fall free.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: So in order for me to have sex with you we have to go on another quest and kill some bitch?

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Right now?

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: Well, if you don’t want to come--~

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Lady warrior. Of course I want to come, but we just got home’ and-

dialogues.speaker: ISABEL
dialogues.text: You know what? Forget it.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS
dialogues.text: Come on. Let’s not fight. Just give me five minutes. That’s all I want... Just to do nothing. She just looks at him. He tries to relax but can’t.

dialogues.speaker: THADEOUS, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh, fuckery. Let’s go! ROLL CREDITS, BITCH.
